text: He that hath the bride is the bridegroom : but the friend of the bridegroom , which standeth and heareth him , rejoiceth greatly because of the bridegroom ' s voice : this my joy therefore is fulfilled .
text2: To yicõari , “ Ãmosiagu ̶ babare bajiro bajiaja yu ̶ ” yigu ̶ , ado bajiro i ̃ buerãre i ̃ nare gotimasioñuju Juan : — Ãmosiariaru ̃ ̶ mu ̶ so manaju ̶ ñarocu ̶ babare ajisu ̶ yaroco me ñagõmo . So manaju ̶ ñarocu ̶ ju ̶ are ajisu ̶ yaroco ñagõmo . So manaju ̶ re so ajisu ̶ yasere i ̃ acõari , bu ̶ to varique ̃ nagu ̃ ̶ mi i ̃ baba . Tire bajirone , “ Masa jãjarãre oco rãca bautizaru ̃ gu ̃ ñuju i ̃ que ̃ ne ” mu ̶ a yisere ajicõari , bu ̶ to varique ̃ naja yu ̶ que ̃ ne .

text: He must increase , but I must decrease .
text2: Yu ̶ re ̃ toro ñamasugu ̃ ̶ ñaami i ̃ ma . To bajiri , yu ̶ re i ̃ na ru ̃ ̶ cu ̶ bu ̶ oro re ̃ toro i ̃ re i ̃ na ru ̃ ̶ cu ̶ bu ̶ osere bojaja yu ̶ — i ̃ buerãre yiyuju Juan .

text: He that cometh from above is above all : he that is of the earth is earthly , and speaketh of the earth : he that cometh from heaven is above all .
text2: Dios tu ̶ ju ̶ vadir ' i ñaami jediro u ̶ ju ̶ ñamasugu ̃ ̶ . Gãji i ̃ cõro ñamasugu ̃ ̶ magu ̃ ̶ mi . Adi macaru ̶ cu ̶ roju ̶ re ruyuariarã , adi macaru ̶ cu ̶ roayere i ̃ arã ñari , tirene gotiaja mani . Dios tu ̶ ju ̶ vadir ' ima õ vecayere , to yicõari , adi macaru ̶ cu ̶ roayere que ̃ ne que ̃ naro masigu ̃ ̶ ñari , jediro u ̶ ju ̶ ñamasugu ̃ ̶ ñaami .

text: And what he hath seen and heard , that he testifieth ; and no man receiveth his testimony .
text2: I ̃ ma , i ̃ i ̃ arere , i ̃ ajirere gotiami i ̃ , Dios yere . To bajiboarine i ̃ gotisere ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ beama masa .

text: He that hath received his testimony hath set to his seal that God is true .
text2: “ Jesús i ̃ yirore bajiro bajiroja ” i ̃ re yiajigu ̶ ma , to bajiro i ̃ yiajise su ̶ orine “ Socagu ̶ me ñaami Dios ” yigu ̶ ñagu ̃ ̶ mi .

text: For he whom God hath sent speaketh the words of God : for God giveth not the Spirit by measure unto him .
text2: Esp ' iritu Santore i ̃ re cõañumi i ̃ macu ̶ re adi macaru ̶ cu ̶ roju ̶ re i ̃ cõar ' ire , “ I ̃ tu ̶ oi ̃ arore bajiro tu ̶ oi ̃ amasiato ” yigu ̶ . To bajiro i ̃ yir ' i ñari , Dios ocarene goticami Jesús .

text: The Father loveth the Son , and hath given all things into his hand .
text2: Mani jacu ̶ Dios , i ̃ macu ̶ re maigu ̃ ̶ ñari , “ Ñajedirore rotiya mu ̶ ” , i ̃ re yicu ̃ ñumi .

text: He that believeth on the Son hath everlasting life : and he that believeth not the Son shall not see life ; but the wrath of God abideth on him .
text2: No bojagu ̶ , Dios macu ̶ re ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ gu ̃ ̶ ma , Dios i ̃ catisere cu ̶ ogu ̶ ñaami . To bajiboarine no bojagu ̶ Dios macu ̶ re ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ becu ̶ ma , Dios i ̃ catisere cu ̶ obeami . To bajiro i ̃ bajijare , rojose i ̃ yisere i ̃ aju ̃ nisini tu ̶ jabecu ̶ ne , rojose i ̃ yise vaja , rojose i ̃ re yiru ̶ cu ̶ mi Dios , rojose tãmu ̶ otu ̶ jabetiriaroju ̶ i ̃ re rocagu ̶ .

text: When therefore the Lord knew how the Pharisees had heard that Jesus made and baptized more disciples than John ,
text2: To bajiri , “ Juan re ̃ tobu ̶ saro masare oco rãca bautizaru ̃ gu ̃ ñuju Jesúju ̶ a . To bajiri Juan buerimasa re ̃ tobu ̶ saro ñañujarã Jesús i ̃ buerimasaju ̶ a ” yire quetire ajiyujarã fariseo masa .

text: ( Though Jesus himself baptized not , but his disciples , )
text2: ( Que ̃ naro masuma , masare oco rãca bautizabetiru ̃ gu ̃ cami Jesús . Yu ̶ aju ̶ a , i ̃ buerimasaju ̶ a masare oco rãca i ̃ nare bautizaru ̃ gu ̃ caju ̶ . )

text: He left Judaea , and departed again into Galilee .
text2: To bajiri , “ Jesús masare oco rãca bautizagu ̶ yigu ̶ mi ” fariseo masa i ̃ na yitu ̶ oi ̃ asere masicõari , Judea sitare ñacana vacoacaju ̶ yu ̶ a Jesúrãca , Galilea sitaju ̶ tudiana yuja .

text: And he must needs go through Samaria .
text2: To vana , Samaria sitare re ̃ toaroti ñacaju ̶ yu ̶ are .

text: Then cometh he to a city of Samaria , which is called Sychar , near to the parcel of ground that Jacob gave to his son Joseph .
text2: To bajiri toju ̶ re ejacoacaju ̶ yu ̶ a , Sicar vãme cu ̶ ti macaju ̶ re . Ti macama Jacob ñamasir ' i , i ̃ macu ̶ Josére i ̃ i ̃ simasire sita tu ̶ ju ̶ ñacaju ̶ ti .

text: Now Jacob ' s well was there . Jesus therefore , being wearied with his journey , sat thus on the well : and it was about the sixth hour .
text2: Toju ̶ re ñacaju ̶ oco goje , Jacob ñamasir ' i ya goje . Bogagu ̶ ñari , ti goje tu ̶ re ejaru ̃ ju ejacami Jesús . U ̃ ̶ mu ̶ recaji cõro muiju tu ̶ sacami .

text: There cometh a woman of Samaria to draw water : Jesus saith unto her , Give me to drink .
text2: Yu ̶ a i ̃ buerãju ̶ ama gaje macaju ̶ bare vaja yirã vacoacaju ̶ yu ̶ a . Toju ̶ re Jesús i ̃ rujirone , si ̃ gõ Samaria sitago oco vago ejayumo so . So oco vago ejaro i ̃ acõari , sore oco se ̃ niñuju Jesús : — Oco yu ̶ re ioya — sore yiyuju i ̃ .

text: Then saith the woman of Samaria unto him , How is it that thou , being a Jew , askest drink of me , which am a woman of Samaria ? for the Jews have no dealings with the Samaritans .
text2: Sore i ̃ oco se ̃ nirone , ado bajiro i ̃ re yiyuju so , Samaria sitago : — ¿ No yigu ̶ jud ' io masu ̶ ñaboarine , Samaritana yu ̶ ñaboajaque ̃ ne , yu ̶ re oco se ̃ niati mu ̶ ? — Jesúre yiyuju so . Samaritano masa , jud ' io masa rãca gãmerã terã ñacoayuja yu ̶ a . To bajiri , to bajiro Jesúre i ̃ re yiyuju so .

text: Jesus answered and said unto her , If thou knewest the gift of God , and who it is that saith to thee , Give me to drink ; thou wouldest have asked of him , and he would have given thee living water .
text2: To bajiro so yisere ajicõari : — Dios i ̃ i ̃ sirotire mu ̶ masijama , “ I ̃ ñaami yu ̶ re oco se ̃ nigu ̃ ̶ ” mu ̶ yimasijama , yu ̶ ju ̶ are oco se ̃ nibogoja mu ̶ . Yu ̶ re mu ̶ oco se ̃ nijama , oco catireayere mu ̶ re iobogu ̶ ja yu ̶ — sore yiyuju Jesús .

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , thou hast nothing to draw with , and the well is deep : from whence then hast thou that living water ?
text2: To bajiro i ̃ yijare , — Ñiene oco vabecu ̶ ja mu ̶ . U ̃ ̶ mu ̶ arigoje ñaja adi goje . ¿ Noju ̶ ayere yu ̶ re catiorotirema yu ̶ re oco iogu ̶ ada mu ̶ ?

text: Art thou greater than our father Jacob , which gave us the well , and drank thereof himself , and his children , and his cattle ?
text2: Mani ñicu ̶ Jacob ñamasir ' i adi gojere cu ̃ masiñumi i ̃ . I ̃ que ̃ ne idimasiñuju , adi goje ocore . I ̃ ri ̃ a que ̃ ne idiyujarã . I ̃ yarã vaibu ̶ cu ̶ rã ecariarã que ̃ ne idiyujarã . Mu ̶ ma , ¿ “ I ̃ re ̃ toro ñamasugu ̃ ̶ ñaja yu ̶ ” yigu ̶ yatique mu ̶ ? — Jesúre i ̃ re yiyuju so .

text: Jesus answered and said unto her , Whosoever drinketh of this water shall thirst again :
text2: To bajiro so yijare , ado bajiro sore cu ̶ diyuju Jesús : — No bojarã adi goje ocore idiboariarã , que ̃ na gãme oco idiru ̶ acõaru ̶ arãma .

text: But whosoever drinketh of the water that I shall give him shall never thirst ; but the water that I shall give him shall be in him a well of water springing up into everlasting life .
text2: No bojarã oco catireayere masare yu ̶ iorãma , que ̃ na gãme oco idiru ̶ abetiru ̶ arãma . I ̃ nare yu ̶ oco iose su ̶ orine Diorãca que ̃ naro ñacõa ñaru ̃ gu ̃ ru ̶ arãma — sore yigotiyuju Jesús .

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , give me this water , that I thirst not , neither come hither to draw .
text2: To bajiro i ̃ yisere ajicõari : — Tiju ̶ are idiru ̶ aja yu ̶ que ̃ ne , “ Que ̃ na adi gojeayere tudi oco vacõari , idirobe yu ̶ ” yigo — Jesúre i ̃ re yiyuju so .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Go , call thy husband , and come hither .
text2: To bajiro so yirone , — Vasa . Mu ̶ manaju ̶ re i ̃ re jiaya . I ̃ re ji , vaba que ̃ na adoju ̶ — sore yiyuju Jesús .

text: The woman answered and said , I have no husband . Jesus said unto her , Thou hast well said , I have no husband :
text2: To bajiro i ̃ yijare , — Manaju ̶ magõ ñaja yu ̶ — yicu ̶ diyuju so . To so yisere ajicõari , ado bajiro sore yiyuju Jesús : — “ Manaju ̶ magõ ñaja yu ̶ ” mu ̶ yiserema soco me yaja mu ̶ .

text: For thou hast had five husbands ; and he whom thou now hast is not thy husband : in that saidst thou truly .
text2: Cojomocãrãcu ̶ ju ̶ manaju ̶ a cu ̶ tirio ñaja mu ̶ . Que ̃ na yucu ̶ mu ̶ rãca ñagu ̃ ̶ que ̃ ne , mu ̶ manaju ̶ masu me ñaami . To bajiri , “ Manaju ̶ magõ ñaja yu ̶ ” mu ̶ yiserema soco me yaja mu ̶ — sore yiyuju Jesús .

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , I perceive that thou art a prophet .
text2: To bajise sore i ̃ yisere ajicõari , ado bajiro i ̃ re yiyuju so : — Diore gotire ̃ tobosagu ̶ ñaja mu ̶ , mu ̶ re yimasiaja yu ̶ — yiyuju so , so bajisere i ̃ gotise ñajare .

text: Our fathers worshipped in this mountain ; and ye say , that in Jerusalem is the place where men ought to worship .
text2: — Mani ñicu ̶ a , adi buroju ̶ ejacõari , vaibu ̶ cu ̶ re soemu ̶ omasiñujarã , Diore i ̃ re yiru ̃ ̶ cu ̶ bu ̶ orã . To bajiboarine mu ̶ ama , jud ' io masama , “ Jerusalénju ̶ ri ̃ ne yiru ̃ gu ̃ roti ñaja ” , yiru ̃ gu ̃ aja mu ̶ a — Jesúre yiyuju so .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , believe me , the hour cometh , when ye shall neither in this mountain , nor yet at Jerusalem , worship the Father .
text2: To bajiro so yijare , ado bajiro sore yiyuju Jesús : — Mu ̶ re yu ̶ gotisere ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ ña mu ̶ : Cojoru ̃ ̶ mu ̶ adi burore que ̃ ne , to yicõari Jerusalénju ̶ re que ̃ ne Diore , mani jacu ̶ re , i ̃ re yiru ̃ ̶ cu ̶ bu ̶ orã vabetiru ̶ arãma masa .

text: Ye worship ye know not what : we know what we worship : for salvation is of the Jews .
text2: Mu ̶ ama , Diore que ̃ naro mu ̶ a masibecu ̶ rene ru ̃ ̶ cu ̶ bu ̶ oaja mu ̶ a . Yu ̶ aju ̶ ama , mu ̶ a re ̃ toro i ̃ re masiaja yu ̶ a . Yu ̶ a , jud ' io masa su ̶ orine masa rojose i ̃ na tãmu ̶ oborotire i ̃ nare yire ̃ tobosaru ̶ cu ̶ mi Dios .

text: But the hour cometh , and now is , when the true worshippers shall worship the Father in spirit and in truth : for the Father seeketh such to worship him .
text2: “ Cojoru ̃ ̶ mu ̶ Diore i ̃ re yiru ̃ ̶ cu ̶ bu ̶ orã vabetiru ̶ arãma ” mu ̶ re yu ̶ yigotiserema yoato mene bajirotirene mu ̶ re gotiaja yu ̶ . Masa , Diore ru ̃ ̶ cu ̶ bu ̶ orã masuma , Esp ' iritu Santo i ̃ bojarore bajiro tu ̶ oi ̃ acõari , i ̃ re ru ̃ ̶ cu ̶ bu ̶ oama i ̃ na . To bajiro i ̃ re yiru ̃ ̶ cu ̶ bu ̶ osere bojaami mani jacu ̶ .

text: God is a Spirit : and they that worship him must worship him in spirit and in truth .
text2: I ̃ abu ̶ jayamagu ̃ ̶ ñaami Dios . To bajiri , masa i ̃ re i ̃ na ru ̃ ̶ cu ̶ bu ̶ omasucõaru ̶ ajama , socarã mene Esp ' iritu Santo i ̃ bojarore bajiro tu ̶ oi ̃ acõari , i ̃ re ru ̃ ̶ cu ̶ bu ̶ orãma — sore yiyuju Jesús .

text: The woman saith unto him , I know that Messias cometh , which is called Christ : when he is come , he will tell us all things .
text2: To bajiro i ̃ yisere ajicõari ado bajiro yiyuju so : — “ Diore gotire ̃ tobosagu ̶ ejaru ̶ cu ̶ mi , Cristo i ̃ na vãme yigu ̶ ” , yimasiaja yu ̶ . Ejacõari , yu ̶ are que ̃ naro gotique ̃ nojeoru ̶ cu ̶ mi — Jesúre yiyuju so .

text: Jesus saith unto her , I that speak unto thee am he .
text2: To bajiro so yirone , — I ̃ ne ñaja yu ̶ , mu ̶ re ñagõgu ̃ ̶ ma — sore yicami Jesús .

text: And upon this came his disciples , and marvelled that he talked with the woman : yet no man said , What seekest thou ? or , Why talkest thou with her ?
text2: To bajiro sore i ̃ yiñarone , tudiejacaju ̶ yu ̶ a , i ̃ buerã . To rõmio rãca i ̃ ñagõñajare , no yimasibeticaju ̶ yu ̶ a , tiu ̃ nire i ̃ abetiru ̃ gu ̃ riarã ñari . To bajiboarine , “ ¿ Ñie u ̃ nire bojati mu ̶ ? ¿ No yigu ̶ so rãca gãmerã ñagõri mu ̶ a ? ” , i ̃ re yise ̃ nii ̃ abeticaju ̶ yu ̶ a .

text: The woman then left her waterpot , and went her way into the city , and saith to the men ,
text2: Yu ̶ a tudiejarone oco varia sotu ̶ re ãmibecone , so ñariaroju ̶ vacoacamo so . So ñariaroju ̶ tudiejacõari , ado bajiro masare i ̃ nare yigoticudiyuju so :

text: Come , see a man , which told me all things that ever I did : is not this the Christ ?
text2: — Jediro yu ̶ yiadirere , “ Ado bajiro yicaju ̶ mu ̶ ” yu ̶ re yigotigu ̶ re i ̃ arã vayá mu ̶ a que ̃ ne . ¿ Diore gotire ̃ tobosagu ̶ , Cristo me ñagu ̃ ̶ yiguida i ̃ ? — i ̃ nare yiyuju so .

text: Then they went out of the city , and came unto him .
text2: To bajiro so yirere ajicõari , Jesúre i ̃ arã , yu ̶ a tu ̶ ju ̶ re vayuma i ̃ na .

text: In the mean while his disciples prayed him , saying , Master , eat .
text2: I ̃ na ejaroto ri ̃ joro ado bajiro Jesúre yiboacaju ̶ yu ̶ a : — Gotimasiorimasu ̶ , baya — i ̃ re yiboacaju ̶ yu ̶ a .

text: But he said unto them , I have meat to eat that ye know not of .
text2: To bajiro i ̃ re yu ̶ a yiboajaque ̃ ne , ado bajiro yu ̶ are cu ̶ dicami Jesús : — Je ̃ re yu ̶ rema yu ̶ bare ñacõaja mu ̶ a masibeti — yu ̶ are yicõacami .

text: Therefore said the disciples one to another , Hath any man brought him ought to eat ?
text2: To bajiro i ̃ yirone , — ¿ Si ̃ gu ̃ ̶ i ̃ re bare cu ̃ gu ̃ ̶ ejarida i ̃ ? — yu ̶ a masune gãmerã yise ̃ nii ̃ acaju ̶ yu ̶ a .

text: Jesus saith unto them , My meat is to do the will of him that sent me , and to finish his work .
text2: To bajiro yu ̶ a gãmerã yiñagõsere ajimasicõari , ado bajiro yu ̶ are yicami Jesús : — Yu ̶ re cõacacu ̶ i ̃ bojasere yu ̶ yijama , ti moarere yu ̶ yigajanojama , tine ñaja yu ̶ barere bajiro bajise . Masama bare bavarique ̃ naru ̃ gu ̃ ama . Yu ̶ ma yu ̶ re cõacacu ̶ i ̃ bojasere bajiro yicõari , varique ̃ naru ̃ gu ̃ aja yu ̶ .

text: Say not ye , There are yet four months , and then cometh harvest ? behold , I say unto you , Lift up your eyes , and look on the fields ; for they are white already to harvest .
text2: “ Babari muijua ru ̶ yaja maji , ote ti bu ̶ cu ̶ aroti , tire mani juare ̃ oroti ” , tocãrãca cu ̃ ̶ mari yiru ̃ gu ̃ aja mu ̶ a . Dios ocare masare gotimasiorãju ̶ ama , ti u ̃ nire yitu ̶ oi ̃ abesa . “ Masare Dios ocare mani gotimasiorotiju ̶ ejabeaja maji ” , yitu ̶ oi ̃ abesa mu ̶ a . Yu ̶ ma ado bajiro yaja : Je ̃ re ote bu ̶ cu ̶ acoaju ̶ yuja . Yucu ̶ acane tire juaroti ñaja . I ̃ ai ̃ asaque . Jãjarã masa yu ̶ re ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ rona vadiama i ̃ na . Ado cõrone i ̃ nare mu ̶ a gotimasiojama , que ̃ namasucõaja , mu ̶ are yaja yu ̶ .

text: And he that reapeth receiveth wages , and gathereth fruit unto life eternal : that both he that soweth and he that reapeth may rejoice together .
text2: Socaro me bajiaja bu ̶ cu ̶ rã i ̃ na gotimasire : “ Si ̃ gu ̃ ̶ ñagu ̃ ̶ mi otegu ̶ . Gãji ñagu ̃ ̶ mi ti rica cu ̶ tiro boca juare ̃ ogu ̃ ̶ ” , yiyujarã bu ̶ cu ̶ rã . To bajiro masune bajiaja ti , yu ̶ ocare gotimasiorãre que ̃ ne . Tu ̶ oi ̃ asaque mu ̶ a : Si ̃ gu ̃ ̶ ri ñaama yu ̶ ocare masare gotimasiosu ̶ orã . Oterimasare bajiro bajirã ñaama . I ̃ na bero i ̃ nare gotimasiorã , ti rica cu ̶ tiro boca juare ̃ orãre bajiro bajirã ñaama gãjerã . I ̃ naju ̶ a i ̃ na gotimasiorone , i ̃ nare ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ ama masa yuja . To bajiri goti ri ̃ joro cu ̶ tiriarã ña , bero gotimasiorã ña , bajiama i ̃ na . No bojagu ̶ otericare juare ̃ ogu ̃ ̶ , vaja bu ̶ jagu ̶ yigu ̶ mi . To bajirone bajirãma yu ̶ ocare masare gotimasiorã que ̃ ne , varique ̃ narere bu ̶ jarã . I ̃ na gotimasiose ti ñajare , yu ̶ re ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ ama masa . To bajiri yu ̶ re ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ rã ñari , Diorãca que ̃ naro ñaru ̃ gu ̃ ru ̶ arãma , i ̃ na rijato beroju ̶ que ̃ ne . To bajiro i ̃ na bajisere i ̃ acõari , i ̃ nare gotimasiosu ̶ oboariarã , bero i ̃ nare gotimasiorã rãca bu ̶ to varique ̃ naru ̶ arãma i ̃ na .

text: I sent you to reap that whereon ye bestowed no labour : other men laboured , and ye are entered into their labours .
text2: Tiru ̃ ̶ mu ̶ ju ̶ que ̃ ne mu ̶ are cõacaju ̶ yu ̶ , mu ̶ a gotimasiose su ̶ orine masa i ̃ na ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ rotire yigu ̶ . Yu ̶ ocare i ̃ nare gotimasiosu ̶ oriarã me ñaja mu ̶ a , bajirãju ̶ ma . To bajiri , gãjerã i ̃ na gotimasioboariarã ñaama , mu ̶ aju ̶ a mu ̶ a gotimasiorone , yu ̶ re ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ rona — yu ̶ are yigoticami Jesús , i ̃ buerimasare .

text: And many of the Samaritans of that city believed on him for the saying of the woman , which testified , He told me all that ever I did .
text2: To bajiro i ̃ nare i ̃ yiro bero , “ Jediro yu ̶ yiadirere , ‘ Ado bajiro yicaju ̶ mu ̶ ’ yu ̶ re yigotimi i ̃ ” rõmio so yigotisere ajicõari , jãjarã ti macariana Samaria sitana , ado bajiro Jesúre tu ̶ oi ̃ acama i ̃ na : “ Diore gotire ̃ tobosagu ̶ , Cristo ñaami ” , Jesúre yitu ̶ oi ̃ acama i ̃ na .

text: So when the Samaritans were come unto him , they besought him that he would tarry with them : and he abode there two days .
text2: To bajiro yitu ̶ oi ̃ arã ñari , Jesús tu ̶ vadieja , i ̃ re i ̃ avarique ̃ nacõari , yu ̶ are tujaroticama i ̃ na . To bajiri , i ̃ na rãca ju ̶ aru ̃ ̶ mu ̶ ñacaju ̶ yu ̶ a .

text: And many more believed because of his own word ;
text2: I ̃ na rãca ñacõari , Jesús i ̃ masune i ̃ nare i ̃ gotimasiosere ajicõari , “ Diore gotire ̃ tobosagu ̶ , Cristo ñaami ” , yitu ̶ oi ̃ acama jãjarãbu ̶ sa .

text: And said unto the woman , Now we believe , not because of thy saying : for we have heard him ourselves , and know that this is indeed the Christ , the Saviour of the world .
text2: Jesúre i ̃ re ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ cõari , ado bajiro sore yicama i ̃ na , rõmiore : — Je ̃ re , i ̃ re ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ aja yu ̶ a , mu ̶ gotise ri ̃ ne me . Yucu ̶ ne yu ̶ a masune i ̃ re ajicõari , “ To bajiro masu bajigu ̶ ñaami ” , i ̃ re yiajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ aja yu ̶ a yuja . “ I ̃ ne ñaami adi macaru ̶ cu ̶ roana rojose mani tãmu ̶ oborotire manire yire ̃ tobosarocu ̶ ” , yimasiaja yu ̶ a yuja — sore yicama i ̃ na , ti macana .

text: Now after two days he departed thence , and went into Galilee .
text2: To yiro bero ju ̶ aru ̃ ̶ mu ̶ bajiña , vacoacaju ̶ yu ̶ a que ̃ na , Jesúrãca , Galilea sitaju ̶ are vana .

text: For Jesus himself testified , that a prophet hath no honour in his own country .
text2: Ado bajiro yu ̶ are yigoticami Jesús , i ̃ na gotimasirere gotigu ̶ : — “ Diore gotire ̃ tobosarimasare i ̃ na ye sitana i ̃ nare ru ̃ ̶ cu ̶ bu ̶ obeama ” yise socaro mene yigotiaja ti — yu ̶ are yigoticami Jesús .

text: Then when he was come into Galilee , the Galilaeans received him , having seen all the things that he did at Jerusalem at the feast : for they also went unto the feast .
text2: Galilea sitaju ̶ re Jesús i ̃ ñariaroju ̶ re i ̃ rãca yu ̶ a ejatone que ̃ naro yu ̶ are yicama toana . I ̃ na que ̃ ne Jerusalénju ̶ Pascua boseru ̃ ̶ mu ̶ ñaro i ̃ arã variarã tudiejariarã ñacama i ̃ na . To bajiri jediro Pascua ñaro Jesús i ̃ yicatire i ̃ ariarã ñañuma i ̃ na que ̃ ne .

text: So Jesus came again into Cana of Galilee , where he made the water wine . And there was a certain nobleman , whose son was sick at Capernaum .
text2: To bajiro bero Galilea sita Caná vãme cu ̶ ti macaju ̶ ejacaju ̶ yu ̶ a que ̃ na , Jesúrãca . To ñacaju ̶ , ocorene u ̶ ye oco i ̃ godoveocato . Toju ̶ re ñacami si ̃ gu ̃ ̶ masu ̶ u ̶ ju ̶ re rotibosagu ̶ . I ̃ macu ̶ , Capernaum vãme cu ̶ ti macaju ̶ bu ̶ to rijañañuju i ̃ .

text: When he heard that Jesus was come out of Judaea into Galilee , he went unto him , and besought him that he would come down , and heal his son : for he was at the point of death .
text2: To bajiri , Judea sitaju ̶ ñar ' i Galilea sitaju ̶ are Jesús i ̃ vadisere ajicõari , i ̃ re i ̃ agu ̃ ̶ ejacami u ̶ ju ̶ re rotibosagu ̶ . Jesús tu ̶ ju ̶ re ejacõari ado bajiro i ̃ re yicami : — Yu ̶ ya viju ̶ vayá . Yu ̶ macu ̶ bajirocacu ̶ yimi . I ̃ re catiogu ̶ vayá — Jesúre , i ̃ re yicami .

text: Then said Jesus unto him , Except ye see signs and wonders , ye will not believe .
text2: To bajiro i ̃ yisere ajicõari , ado bajiro i ̃ re yicami Jesús : — I ̃ ai ̃ añamanire yu ̶ yii ̃ osere mu ̶ a i ̃ abetijama , “ Dios i ̃ masise rãca yigu ̶ yami ” , yu ̶ re yiajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ betiru ̶ arãja mu ̶ a — i ̃ re yicami Jesús .

text: The nobleman saith unto him , Sir , come down ere my child die .
text2: To bajiro i ̃ yiboajaque ̃ ne : — Yu ̶ rãca mu ̶ vadibetijama , bajirocacoaru ̶ cu ̶ mi yu ̶ macu ̶ — Jesúre i ̃ re yicami .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Go thy way ; thy son liveth . And the man believed the word that Jesus had spoken unto him , and he went his way .
text2: To bajiro i ̃ yijare yuja : — Mu ̶ ya viju ̶ tudiasa . Je ̃ re i ̃ re catiocõaja yu ̶ — i ̃ re boca yicõacami Jesúju ̶ ama . To bajise i ̃ re i ̃ yisere ajicõari , Jesúre i ̃ re ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ cami . To bajiri i ̃ ya viju ̶ tudicoacami yuja .

text: And as he was now going down , his servants met him , and told him , saying , Thy son liveth .
text2: I ̃ ya vire i ̃ cõñaru ̃ tuatone , i ̃ re moabosarimasa bocacõari , ado bajiro i ̃ re yigoti bocayujarã i ̃ na : — Je ̃ re mu ̶ macu ̶ que ̃ nacoami yuja — i ̃ re yiyujarã i ̃ na .

text: Then inquired he of them the hour when he began to amend . And they said unto him , Yesterday at the seventh hour the fever left him .
text2: To bajiro i ̃ na yirone , — ¿ No cõro masune tudique ̃ nasu ̶ ori i ̃ , yu ̶ macu ̶ ? — i ̃ nare yise ̃ nii ̃ añuju . — Ñamica , u ̃ ̶ mu ̶ recaji ñaro masune i ̃ re tu ̶ jamasimu ̶ ti — i ̃ re yiyujarã i ̃ na , i ̃ na u ̶ ju ̶ re .

text: So the father knew that it was at the same hour , in the which Jesus said unto him , Thy son liveth : and himself believed , and his whole house .
text2: To bajiro i ̃ re i ̃ na yibocarone , “ To cõro muiju i ̃ tu ̶ satone , ‘ Je ̃ re mu ̶ macu ̶ re catiocõaja yu ̶ ’ yu ̶ re yimasimi Jesús ” , yitu ̶ oi ̃ amasiñuju i ̃ . To bajiri i ̃ que ̃ ne , i ̃ yarã que ̃ ne , “ ‘ Rotimu ̶ oru ̃ ̶ gõru ̶ cu ̶ mi ’ Dios i ̃ yicõagu ̃ ̶ , manire ejare ̃ morocu ̶ ñaami ” , Jesúre i ̃ re yiajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ ñujarã i ̃ na .

text: This is again the second miracle that Jesus did , when he was come out of Judaea into Galilee .
text2: Ti ñacaju ̶ que ̃ na gaje i ̃ ai ̃ añamani Jesús i ̃ yii ̃ obabocati , Judea sitare ñacõari , Galilea sitaju ̶ tudiejacõari , i ̃ yii ̃ ocati .

text: After this there was a feast of the Jews ; and Jesus went up to Jerusalem .
text2: To i ̃ yiro bero , jud ' io masa i ̃ na bajimasirere tu ̶ oi ̃ acõari , boseru ̃ ̶ mu ̶ ti ejajare , Jerusalénju ̶ yu ̶ are u ̃ mato vacami Jesús .

text: Now there is at Jerusalem by the sheep market a pool , which is called in the Hebrew tongue Bethesda , having five porches .
text2: Ti macana i ̃ na vajanare , “ Sãjaroma i ̃ na ” yirã , i ̃ na matagãniriacu ̃ ̶ ni soje , Oveja vãme cu ̶ ti soje ñacaju ̶ ti . Ti soje tu ̶ re ñacaju ̶ masa i ̃ na guarita . Hebreo ocama Betzata vãme cu ̶ ticaju ̶ tira . Tira tu ̶ re cojomocãrãca viriaca sitane i ̃ na veariaviriaca ñacaju ̶ , rijaye cu ̶ tirã i ̃ na cu ̃ ñariviriaca .

text: In these lay a great multitude of impotent folk , of blind , halt , withered , waiting for the moving of the water .
text2: Toju ̶ re jãjarã ñacama rijaye cu ̶ tirã . Caje i ̃ amena , rujasagueri vana , micarã que ̃ ne , to cu ̃ ñacama . Tira oco ti saberotire yurã , bajicu ̃ ñacama i ̃ na .

text: For an angel went down at a certain season into the pool , and troubled the water : whosoever then first after the troubling of the water stepped in was made whole of whatsoever disease he had .
text2: Dios tu ̶ agu ̶ , ángel , tocãrãcaji tiraju ̶ re i ̃ ejarone , tira oco saberu ̃ gu ̃ ñuju ti . To ti bajirone , no bojagu ̶ rijaye cu ̶ tigu ̶ , varocaroasu ̶ ogu ̶ ri ̃ ne guaro catiru ̃ gu ̃ ñuju i ̃ .

text: And a certain man was there , which had an infirmity thirty and eight years .
text2: Toju ̶ rijaye cu ̶ tirã vatoaju ̶ ñacami si ̃ gu ̃ ̶ treinta y ocho cu ̃ ̶ mari rijañar ' i .

text: When Jesus saw him lie , and knew that he had been now a long time in that case , he saith unto him , Wilt thou be made whole ?
text2: I ̃ cu ̃ ñaro i ̃ acõari , yoaro i ̃ cu ̃ ñaru ̃ gu ̃ rere i ̃ amasicõari , ado bajiro i ̃ re se ̃ nii ̃ acami Jesús : — ¿ Que ̃ na tudicati que ̃ naejacoaru ̶ ati mu ̶ ? — i ̃ re yicami Jesús .

text: The impotent man answered him , Sir , I have no man , when the water is troubled , to put me into the pool : but while I am coming , another steppeth down before me .
text2: To bajiro i ̃ yisere ajicõari , ado bajiro i ̃ re yicami : — Si ̃ gu ̃ ̶ ju ̶ ama oco ti saberone yu ̶ re ãmiroñuagu ̃ ̶ maami . Tocãrãcaji oco ti sabero , gãjerãju ̶ a ri ̃ ne yu ̶ ri ̃ joro ñuñaveocõaru ̃ gu ̃ ama i ̃ na — i ̃ re yicami , Jesúre .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Rise , take up thy bed , and walk .
text2: To bajiro i ̃ yirone , — Vu ̃ ̶ mu ̶ ru ̃ ̶ gu ̃ ̶ ña . Mu ̶ cu ̃ ñaritore ãmiña . To yicõari , vasa — i ̃ re yicami Jesús .

text: And immediately the man was made whole , and took up his bed , and walked : and on the same day was the sabbath .
text2: To i ̃ yiriri ̃ marone , que ̃ naro catique ̃ nagu ̃ ̶ ñacoacami i ̃ yuja . I ̃ cu ̃ ñaritore ãmi , vasu ̶ ocami yuja . Tiru ̃ ̶ mu ̶ ñacaju ̶ jud ' io masa yu ̶ a u ̶ su ̶ sãjariaru ̃ ̶ mu ̶ .

text: The Jews therefore said unto him that was cured , It is the sabbath day : it is not lawful for thee to carry thy bed .
text2: To bajiri i ̃ cu ̃ ñaritore i ̃ gaja vato i ̃ acõari , ado bajiro i ̃ re yicama jud ' io masa u ̶ jarã : — Yucu ̶ ma u ̶ su ̶ sãjariaru ̃ ̶ mu ̶ ñaja . To bajiri mu ̶ cu ̃ ñaritore gajabesa mu ̶ . To bajiro mu ̶ yijama , moare ñaja ti — i ̃ re yicama si ̃ gu ̃ ̶ ri , Jesús i ̃ catiocacu ̶ re .

text: He answered them , He that made me whole , the same said unto me , Take up thy bed , and walk .
text2: To bajiro i ̃ na yiro , ado bajiro i ̃ nare cu ̶ dicami Jesús i ̃ catiocacu ̶ : — Yu ̶ re catiogu ̶ , “ Mu ̶ cu ̃ ñaritore ãmiasa ” , yu ̶ re yimi — i ̃ nare yicami .

text: Then asked they him , What man is that which said unto thee , Take up thy bed , and walk ?
text2: To bajiro i ̃ yisere ajicõari , ado bajiro i ̃ re se ̃ nii ̃ acama i ̃ na : — ¿ Ñimu ̶ ñari , “ Mu ̶ cu ̃ ñaritore ãmiasa ” mu ̶ re yigu ̶ ma ? — i ̃ re yise ̃ nii ̃ acama i ̃ na .

text: And he that was healed wist not who it was : for Jesus had conveyed himself away , a multitude being in that place .
text2: To bajiro i ̃ re i ̃ na yise ̃ nii ̃ aboajaque ̃ ne , toju ̶ re jãjarã masa vatoaju ̶ Jesús i ̃ vayayicoajare , “ I ̃ ñaami ” , i ̃ nare yigotimasibeticami .

text: Afterward Jesus findeth him in the temple , and said unto him , Behold , thou art made whole : sin no more , lest a worse thing come unto thee .
text2: Tiju ̶ bero , Diore yiru ̃ ̶ cu ̶ bu ̶ oriaviju ̶ yu ̶ a ñaro , rijaru ̃ ̶ mu ̶ ri cu ̶ tir ' ire i ̃ re i ̃ abu ̶ jacami Jesús que ̃ na . I ̃ re i ̃ abu ̶ jacõari , ado bajiro i ̃ re yicami Jesús : — Ajiya . Que ̃ naro que ̃ na tudicaticoaju ̶ mu ̶ . Que ̃ na gãme rojose yibesa , “ Bu ̶ tobu ̶ sa rojose tãmu ̶ orobe ” yigu ̶ — i ̃ re yicami Jesús .

text: The man departed , and told the Jews that it was Jesus , which had made him whole .
text2: To bajiro i ̃ yiro bero micase rijaye cu ̶ tiboacacu ̶ , i ̃ re se ̃ nii ̃ aboariarã tu ̶ ju ̶ ejacõari , “ Jesúne ñaami , yu ̶ re catiogu ̶ ” , i ̃ nare yigotiyumi i ̃ .

text: And therefore did the Jews persecute Jesus , and sought to slay him , because he had done these things on the sabbath day .
text2: To bajiri u ̶ su ̶ sãjariaru ̃ ̶ mu ̶ re micaboacacu ̶ re Jesús i ̃ re i ̃ catiocatore bajiro gãjerãre to bajirone i ̃ yiru ̃ gu ̃ jare , josari i ̃ tãmu ̶ orotire yirã , i ̃ re rojose yisu ̶ yacama i ̃ na , jud ' io masa u ̶ jarã .

text: But Jesus answered them , My Father worketh hitherto , and I work .
text2: “ U ̶ su ̶ sãjariaru ̃ ̶ mu ̶ ti ñaboajaque ̃ ne , masare i ̃ catiose vaja , rojose tãmu ̶ oato i ̃ ” yirã i ̃ na ñaboajaque ̃ ne , ado bajiro i ̃ nare yicami Jesúju ̶ ama : — Masa rijaye cu ̶ tirãre catiotu ̶ jabecu ̶ ñaami Dios , yu ̶ jacu ̶ . To bajiri i ̃ nare catiotu ̶ jabeaja yu ̶ que ̃ ne — i ̃ nare yicami Jesús .

text: Therefore the Jews sought the more to kill him , because he not only had broken the sabbath , but said also that God was his Father , making himself equal with God .
text2: “ U ̶ su ̶ sãjariaru ̃ ̶ mu ̶ re Dios i ̃ moarotibetiboajaque ̃ ne , moami Jesús ” , i ̃ re yiju ̃ nisinicama jud ' io masa u ̶ jarã , i ̃ re si ̃ aru ̶ arã . To yicõari , “ Dios ñaami yu ̶ jacu ̶ ” i ̃ yisere ajicõari , “ ‘ Diore bajiro ñamasugu ̃ ̶ ñaja yu ̶ ’ yigu ̶ yami ” , yicama i ̃ na . To bajiro yirã ñari , bu ̶ tobu ̶ sa ju ̃ nisinirã ñari , i ̃ re si ̃ aru ̶ a tu ̶ oi ̃ acama i ̃ na .

text: Then answered Jesus and said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , The Son can do nothing of himself , but what he seeth the Father do : for what things soever he doeth , these also doeth the Son likewise .
text2: To bajise i ̃ na yitu ̶ oi ̃ asere i ̃ amasicõari ado bajiro i ̃ nare yicami Jesús : — Ñamasusere riojo mu ̶ are gotiaja yu ̶ : Dios macu ̶ ñari , yu ̶ bojase yibeaja yu ̶ . Yu ̶ jacu ̶ i ̃ yisere i ̃ acõari , i ̃ yirore bajirone yaja yu ̶ . Jediro yu ̶ jacu ̶ i ̃ yirore bajirone yu ̶ que ̃ ne i ̃ macu ̶ que ̃ ne , to bajirone yaja .

text: For the Father loveth the Son , and sheweth him all things that himself doeth : and he will shew him greater works than these , that ye may marvel .
text2: Yu ̶ jacu ̶ yu ̶ re maiami . Yu ̶ re maigu ̃ ̶ ñari , jediro i ̃ yisere yu ̶ re i ̃ oami . Adiru ̃ ̶ mu ̶ riaye re ̃ toro josasere yu ̶ re yii ̃ oru ̶ cu ̶ mi . To bajiro i ̃ yisere yu ̶ yii ̃ osere i ̃ acõari , no yimasibetiru ̶ arãja mu ̶ a que ̃ ne , ti u ̃ nire i ̃ abetiru ̃ gu ̃ riarã ñari .

text: For as the Father raiseth up the dead , and quickeneth them ; even so the Son quickeneth whom he will .
text2: Bajireariarãre catioru ̃ gu ̃ ami yu ̶ jacu ̶ . To bajiri yu ̶ , i ̃ macu ̶ que ̃ ne , i ̃ yiru ̃ gu ̃ rore bajirone yiru ̃ gu ̃ aja yu ̶ , no yu ̶ bojarãre .

text: For the Father judgeth no man , but hath committed all judgment unto the Son :
text2: Masa rojorãre beserocu ̶ me ñaami yu ̶ jacu ̶ . “ I ̃ nare beserocu ̶ ñaja mu ̶ ” , yu ̶ re yicami .

text: That all men should honour the Son , even as they honour the Father . He that honoureth not the Son honoureth not the Father which hath sent him .
text2: To bajiro yu ̶ re yicami , i ̃ re que ̃ naro i ̃ na yiru ̃ ̶ cu ̶ bu ̶ orore bajirone yu ̶ re que ̃ ne “ Yiru ̃ ̶ cu ̶ bu ̶ oato i ̃ na ” yigu ̶ . Que ̃ naro yu ̶ re yiru ̃ ̶ cu ̶ bu ̶ obecu ̶ ma , yu ̶ jacu ̶ re , yu ̶ re cõacacu ̶ re que ̃ ne yiru ̃ ̶ cu ̶ bu ̶ obecu ̶ yigu ̶ mi — jud ' io masa u ̶ jarãre yicami Jesús .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that heareth my word , and believeth on him that sent me , hath everlasting life , and shall not come into condemnation ; but is passed from death unto life .
text2: To bajiro i ̃ nare yigajanocõari , ado bajiro goticami Jesús : — Ñamasusere riojo mu ̶ are gotiaja yu ̶ : No bojagu ̶ yu ̶ ocare ajicõari , yu ̶ re cõacacu ̶ re ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ gu ̃ ̶ ma , Dios i ̃ catisere cu ̶ ogu ̶ ñaami . I ̃ u ̃ gu ̃ ̶ rema , rojose tãmu ̶ otu ̶ jabetiriaroju ̶ i ̃ re cõabetiru ̶ cu ̶ mi Dios .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , The hour is coming , and now is , when the dead shall hear the voice of the Son of God : and they that hear shall live .
text2: Ñamasusere riojo mu ̶ are gotiaja yu ̶ : Adiru ̃ ̶ mu ̶ ri bajirotirene mu ̶ are yaja yu ̶ : Yu ̶ re ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ menama , bajireariarãre bajiro bajirãma , i ̃ na rijato beroju ̶ “ Tudirijabeticõato ” yigu ̶ , Dios i ̃ catisere cu ̶ omena ñari . To bajiboarine Dios macu ̶ re yu ̶ re ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ ru ̶ arãma si ̃ gu ̃ ̶ ri . I ̃ naju ̶ are , “ I ̃ na rijato beroju ̶ tudirijabeticõato ” yigu ̶ , Dios i ̃ catisere i ̃ nare i ̃ siru ̶ cu ̶ ja yu ̶ .

text: For as the Father hath life in himself ; so hath he given to the Son to have life in himself ;
text2: Masare yu ̶ jacu ̶ i ̃ catioru ̃ gu ̃ rore bajiro yu ̶ re i ̃ catioroticati ñajare , i ̃ catisere i ̃ nare i ̃ simasiaja yu ̶ .

text: And hath given him authority to execute judgment also , because he is the Son of man .
text2: To yicõari , Dios macu ̶ ñaboarine , masu ̶ re bajiro ruju ̶ cu ̶ ticõari , masa vatoaju ̶ ñar ' i yu ̶ ñajare , “ Masare besemasiru ̶ cu ̶ ja mu ̶ ” , yu ̶ re yicami yu ̶ jacu ̶ .

text: Marvel not at this : for the hour is coming , in the which all that are in the graves shall hear his voice ,
text2: To bajiro yu ̶ yisere ajiyamanire bajiro ajitu ̶ oi ̃ abesa mu ̶ a . Bajireariarã jediro i ̃ nare yu ̶ jiro , i ̃ na ajijedirotiru ̃ ̶ mu ̶ ejaru ̶ aroja .

text: And shall come forth ; they that have done good , unto the resurrection of life ; and they that have done evil , unto the resurrection of damnation .
text2: To cõrone yu ̶ jisere ajicõari , yu ̶ tu ̶ ju ̶ ejajediru ̶ arãma i ̃ na , tudicatiana yuja . Yu ̶ tu ̶ ejacõari , que ̃ naro yiru ̃ gu ̃ riarãma , Diorãca que ̃ naro ñacõa ñaru ̃ gu ̃ ru ̶ arãma i ̃ na . Rojose yiru ̃ gu ̃ riarãrema rojose tãmu ̶ otu ̶ jabetiriaroju ̶ i ̃ nare cõaru ̶ cu ̶ ja yu ̶ yuja — i ̃ nare yigoticami Jesús , jud ' io masa u ̶ jarãre .

text: I can of mine own self do nothing : as I hear , I judge : and my judgment is just ; because I seek not mine own will , but the will of the Father which hath sent me .
text2: Que ̃ na ado bajiro i ̃ nare goticami Jesús : — Yu ̶ bojarore bajiro yigu ̶ me ñaja yu ̶ . Yu ̶ re cõacacu ̶ i ̃ bojarore bajiro yiru ̶ a tu ̶ oi ̃ agu ̃ ̶ ñari , masare rojose yirãre , to yicõari que ̃ nase yirãre yu ̶ i ̃ abesejama , que ̃ naro riojo yaja yu ̶ .

text: If I bear witness of myself , my witness is not true .
text2: “ To bajiro yigu ̶ ñaja yu ̶ ” yu ̶ masurione yu ̶ yijama , “ Socu ̶ yami ” , yu ̶ re yiroti ñaboroja .

text: There is another that beareth witness of me ; and I know that the witness which he witnesseth of me is true .
text2: To bajiboarine , ñaami si ̃ gu ̃ ̶ , yu ̶ re gotibosagu ̶ . Yu ̶ re i ̃ gotibosase , que ̃ naro riojo ñaja ti .

text: Ye sent unto John , and he bare witness unto the truth .
text2: Gãji que ̃ ne , “ I ̃ ne ñaami ‘ Rotimu ̶ oru ̃ ̶ gõru ̶ cu ̶ mi ’ yigu ̶ Dios i ̃ cõar ' i ” , yu ̶ re yigotibosayumi , Juan , masare oco rãca bautizarimasu ̶ . I ̃ tu ̶ ju ̶ re mu ̶ a ejare ̃ morimasare se ̃ nii ̃ aroticõañuja mu ̶ a . Que ̃ naro riojo mu ̶ are cu ̶ diyumi .

text: But I receive not testimony from man : but these things I say , that ye might be saved .
text2: “ Rotimu ̶ oru ̃ ̶ gõru ̶ cu ̶ mi ” yigu ̶ Dios i ̃ cõar ' ire yu ̶ re i ̃ gotibosajaque ̃ ne , yu ̶ re i ̃ gotibosabetijaque ̃ ne , no yibeaja ti , yu ̶ re , Dios i ̃ cõacacu ̶ ñari . Juan yu ̶ re i ̃ gotibosarere mu ̶ are gotiaja yu ̶ , tire ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ cõari , rojose tãmu ̶ otu ̶ jabetiriaroju ̶ mu ̶ a vabetirotire bojagu ̶ ñari .

text: He was a burning and a shining light : and ye were willing for a season to rejoice in his light .
text2: Si ̃ abusuocõari que ̃ naro riojo i ̃ amasire ñaja . Tire bajirone bajicami Juan , que ̃ naro riojo yu ̶ re gotibosacacu ̶ ñari . I ̃ re ajivarique ̃ nañuja mu ̶ a maji .

text: But I have greater witness than that of John : for the works which the Father hath given me to finish , the same works that I do , bear witness of me , that the Father hath sent me .
text2: To bajiro mu ̶ are yiboarine , “ Si ̃ gu ̃ ̶ ñaami yu ̶ re gotibosagu ̶ ” yu ̶ yijama , Juanre tu ̶ oi ̃ agu ̃ ̶ me yaja yu ̶ . Juan yu ̶ re i ̃ gotibosacati re ̃ toro ñamasuse ñaja . Tima i ̃ ai ̃ añamanire mu ̶ are yu ̶ yii ̃ oru ̃ gu ̃ se , yu ̶ jacu ̶ yu ̶ re i ̃ rotise ñaja . Tire i ̃ acõari , “ Socu ̶ me yami . Dios i ̃ cõar ' i ñaami ” , yu ̶ re yimasiama masa .

text: And the Father himself , which hath sent me , hath borne witness of me . Ye have neither heard his voice at any time , nor seen his shape .
text2: Yu ̶ jacu ̶ yu ̶ re cõacacu ̶ que ̃ ne , i ̃ masune , “ Yu ̶ macu ̶ , yu ̶ cõagu ̃ ̶ ñaami ” yigu ̶ ñari , masa i ̃ na ajimasirotire i ̃ nare cõaru ̃ gu ̃ ami . I ̃ cõacacu ̶ re yu ̶ re ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ mena ñari , i ̃ re ajimena , to yicõari , i ̃ ocare ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ mena ñaja mu ̶ a .

text: Search the scriptures ; for in them ye think ye have eternal life : and they are they which testify of me .
text2: Dios ocare masa i ̃ na ucamasirere bu ̶ to bueru ̃ gu ̃ boaja mu ̶ a , “ Ti ocare mani buejama , Diorãca que ̃ naro ñacõari , mani rijato beroju ̶ i ̃ rãca que ̃ naro ñacõa ñaru ̃ gu ̃ ru ̶ arãja mani ” yirã . To bajiboarine yu ̶ bajiserene mu ̶ are ti gotiboajaque ̃ ne , yu ̶ re ajiru ̶ abeaja mu ̶ a . Yu ̶ re mu ̶ a ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ jama , Diorãca que ̃ naro ñacõari , mu ̶ a rijato beroju ̶ i ̃ rãca que ̃ naro ñacõa ñaru ̃ gu ̃ borãja mu ̶ a .

text: I receive not honour from men .
text2: “ Que ̃ naro yu ̶ re yiru ̃ ̶ cu ̶ bu ̶ oato masa ” yigu ̶ me , adi macaru ̶ cu ̶ roju ̶ re vadicaju ̶ yu ̶ .

text: But I know you , that ye have not the love of God in you .
text2: Mu ̶ a tu ̶ oi ̃ asere i ̃ amasiaja yu ̶ . To bajiri , “ Diore mairã me ñaja mu ̶ a ” , mu ̶ are yimasiaja yu ̶ .

text: I am come in my Father ' s name , and ye receive me not : if another shall come in his own name , him ye will receive .
text2: Yu ̶ jacu ̶ yu ̶ re i ̃ roticõajare , adoju ̶ vadicaju ̶ yu ̶ , mu ̶ are gotimasiogu ̃ ̶ . To bajiro yu ̶ bajiboajaque ̃ ne , yu ̶ re ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ beaja mu ̶ a . No bojagu ̶ , Dios i ̃ cõabecu ̶ rema , “ Masa que ̃ naro yu ̶ re yiru ̃ ̶ cu ̶ bu ̶ oato i ̃ na ” yigu ̶ i ̃ vadijama , i ̃ ju ̶ are ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ ru ̶ arãja mu ̶ a .

text: How can ye believe , which receive honour one of another , and seek not the honour that cometh from God only ?
text2: Mu ̶ a masune que ̃ nase gãmerã yiru ̃ ̶ cu ̶ bu ̶ orere bojaru ̃ gu ̃ aja mu ̶ a . Dios si ̃ gu ̃ ̶ ne ñaami mani u ̶ ju ̶ . To bajigu ̶ i ̃ ñaboajaque ̃ ne , “ Que ̃ nase manire yato Dios ” yirã , no bojase mu ̶ a yirotire yitu ̶ oi ̃ abetiru ̃ gu ̃ aja mu ̶ a . To bajiro bajirã ñari , yu ̶ re ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ beaja mu ̶ a .

text: Do not think that I will accuse you to the Father : there is one that accuseth you , even Moses , in whom ye trust .
text2: Yu ̶ jacu ̶ tu ̶ ju ̶ re mu ̶ a ejaro , “ Yu ̶ re ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ beticama ” , mu ̶ are yigotiyirobetiru ̶ cu ̶ ja yu ̶ . Moisés ñamasir ' ine ñaami to bajisere mu ̶ are yigotiyirogu ̶ . “ Moisés ñamasir ' i i ̃ rotimasirere que ̃ naro mani ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ jama , Dios tu ̶ ju ̶ varu ̶ arãja mani ” , yitu ̶ oi ̃ aboaja mu ̶ a .

text: For had ye believed Moses , ye would have believed me : for he wrote of me .
text2: To bajiboarine yu ̶ bajirotirene ucamasiñumi Moisés . To bajiri i ̃ ucamasirere mu ̶ a ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ masucõajama , yu ̶ re que ̃ ne ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ borãja mu ̶ a .

text: But if ye believe not his writings , how shall ye believe my words ?
text2: I ̃ ucamasirere que ̃ naro ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ mena ñari , yu ̶ re que ̃ ne ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ beaja mu ̶ a , — i ̃ nare yicami Jesús , jud ' io masa u ̶ jarãre .

text: After these things Jesus went over the sea of Galilee , which is the sea of Tiberias .
text2: To bajiro i ̃ nare i ̃ yiro bero , u ̶ tabu ̶ cu ̶ ra Galilea vãme cu ̶ tira gajejacatu ̶ aju ̶ aju ̶ yu ̶ are u ̃ mato je ̃ acami Jesús . Gaje vãme , Tiberias vãme cu ̶ ticaju ̶ tira .

text: And a great multitude followed him , because they saw his miracles which he did on them that were diseased .
text2: “ Dios macu ̶ ne ñaja yu ̶ ” yigu ̶ , rijaye cu ̶ tirãre Jesús i ̃ catioru ̃ gu ̃ sere i ̃ acõari , jãjarã masa i ̃ re su ̶ yaru ̃ gu ̃ cama i ̃ na .

text: And Jesus went up into a mountain , and there he sat with his disciples .
text2: Gajejacatu ̶ aju ̶ ejacõari , burore yu ̶ are u ̃ mato majacõari , rujicami Jesús .

text: And the passover , a feast of the Jews , was nigh .
text2: Pascua boseru ̃ ̶ mu ̶ jud ' io masa yu ̶ a que ̃ norotiru ̃ ̶ mu ̶ cõñacaju ̶ .

text: When Jesus then lifted up his eyes , and saw a great company come unto him , he saith unto Philip , Whence shall we buy bread , that these may eat ?
text2: To bajiri jãjarã masa Jesúre i ̃ re su ̶ yaru ̃ gu ̃ rã i ̃ na vadore i ̃ acõari , ado bajiro Felipere i ̃ re yicami Jesús : — I ̃ nare ecaru ̶ arã , ¿ noju ̶ bare vaja yirãti mani ? — i ̃ re yicami .

text: And this he said to prove him : for he himself knew what he would do .
text2: “ Ado bajiro yiru ̶ cu ̶ ja yu ̶ ” yimasiboarine , “ ‘ Mu ̶ ejare ̃ mose rãca ecamasicõaru ̶ arãja ’ Felipe yu ̶ re i ̃ yicu ̶ diro ajigu ̶ sa ” i ̃ re yigu ̶ ne , yicõañumi Jesús .

text: Philip answered him , Two hundred pennyworth of bread is not sufficient for them , that every one of them may take a little .
text2: To bajiro i ̃ yijare ado bajiro i ̃ re yicu ̶ dicami Felipe : — Doscientos gãjoatiiri rãca vaja yiboarine , i ̃ nare ecajeomasibetiborãja mani — Jesúre i ̃ re yicami .

text: One of his disciples , Andrew , Simon Peter ' s brother , saith unto him ,
text2: To i ̃ yirone , yu ̶ a rãcagu ̶ , Pedro bedi Andrés vãme cu ̶ tigu ̶ , ado bajiro Jesúre yicami :

text: There is a lad here , which hath five barley loaves , and two small fishes : but what are they among so many ?
text2: — Si ̃ gu ̃ ̶ daquegu ̶ , cojomo cõro pan cebada vãme cu ̶ tise , to yicõari , ju ̶ arã vaire cu ̶ oboami , bajigu ̶ ju ̶ ma . Masa jãjarã i ̃ na ñajare , ti ̃ jariaro manimasucõaja ti — Jesúre i ̃ re yicami Andrés .

text: And Jesus said , Make the men sit down . Now there was much grass in the place . So the men sat down , in number about five thousand .
text2: To bajiro i ̃ yirone , — Masare i ̃ nare rujirotiya — yicami Jesús . Toju ̶ re tatu ̃ curo ñacaju ̶ . To bajiri , ta joeju ̶ rujicama . Cinco mil u ̃ ̶ mu ̶ a ñacama i ̃ na .

text: And Jesus took the loaves ; and when he had given thanks , he distributed to the disciples , and the disciples to them that were set down ; and likewise of the fishes as much as they would .
text2: I ̃ na rujijediro i ̃ acõari , pan daquegu ̶ i ̃ baborotirene juacõari , “ Que ̃ naro yaja mu ̶ ” , Diore yivarique ̃ nacami Jesús . To yicõari i ̃ buerãre yu ̶ are i ̃ sicami , “ Rujirãre i ̃ sibatoya ” yigu ̶ . Vaire que ̃ ne , to bajirone yicami . Si ̃ gu ̃ ̶ ru ̶ yariaro mano que ̃ naro bau ̶ su ̶ cu ̶ tijedicõacama .

text: When they were filled , he said unto his disciples , Gather up the fragments that remain , that nothing be lost .
text2: I ̃ na bagajanoro i ̃ acõari , ado bajiro yu ̶ are yicami Jesús : — I ̃ na baru ̶ asere juare ̃ oña . Bajirearobe tiju ̶ ma — yu ̶ are yicami Jesús .

text: Therefore they gathered them together , and filled twelve baskets with the fragments of the five barley loaves , which remained over and above unto them that had eaten .
text2: To bajiro yu ̶ are i ̃ yijare , cebada vãme cu ̶ tise cojomo cõro pan ñaboarere yu ̶ a juare ̃ ojama , ju ̶ aãmo cõro , gu ̶ bo ju ̶ a je ̃ nituaro ñarijibu ̶ ri ru ̶ yacaju ̶ .

text: Then those men , when they had seen the miracle that Jesus did , said , This is of a truth that prophet that should come into the world .
text2: To bajiro i ̃ ai ̃ añamanire Jesús i ̃ yii ̃ oro i ̃ acõari , ado bajiro yicama masa : — Diore gotire ̃ tobosarimasu ̶ , adi macaru ̶ cu ̶ roju ̶ re vadicõari , manire rotirocu ̶ ne ñaami — Jesúre i ̃ re yicama masa .

text: When Jesus therefore perceived that they would come and take him by force , to make him a king , he departed again into a mountain himself alone .
text2: To bajiro i ̃ na yijare , “ Yu ̶ bojabetiboajaque ̃ ne , yu ̶ re ãmivacõari u ̶ ju ̶ yu ̶ re cu ̃ ru ̶ ama ” yimasicõari , i ̃ si ̃ gu ̃ ̶ ne buro joeju ̶ re majacoacami Jesús .

text: And when even was now come , his disciples went down unto the sea ,
text2: Ti rãioato i ̃ acõari , u ̶ tabu ̶ cu ̶ rare rojaejacaju ̶ yu ̶ a , Jesús buerimasa .

text: And entered into a ship , and went over the sea toward Capernaum . And it was now dark , and Jesus was not come to them .
text2: Rojaeja , cu ̃ mua vasãja je ̃ acaju ̶ yu ̶ a , gajejacatu ̶ aju ̶ Capernaum vãme cu ̶ ti macaju ̶ vana . Ti re ̃ tiacoaboajaque ̃ ne , ejabeticõacami Jesús .

text: And the sea arose by reason of a great wind that blew .
text2: To yu ̶ a bajije ̃ aru ̃ tuatone , bu ̶ to mino vacaju ̶ . To bajica yiro , bu ̶ to sabetu ̶ ocõacaju ̶ ti .

text: So when they had rowed about five and twenty or thirty furlongs , they see Jesus walking on the sea , and drawing nigh unto the ship : and they were afraid .
text2: Cinco o seis kilómetros cõro yu ̶ a je ̃ atu ̶ satone , yu ̶ a tu ̶ ju ̶ oco joene vadicami Jesús . Oco joene i ̃ vadire i ̃ arãne , u ̶ cacaju ̶ yu ̶ a .

text: But he saith unto them , It is I ; be not afraid .
text2: To bajiro yu ̶ a bajiboajaque ̃ ne , ado bajiro yu ̶ are yicami Jesús : — Güibesa . Yu ̶ ne ñaja — yu ̶ are yi vadicami Jesús .

text: Then they willingly received him into the ship : and immediately the ship was at the land whither they went .
text2: To bajiro yu ̶ are i ̃ yijare , varique ̃ narãne , i ̃ re sãcaju ̶ yu ̶ a . I ̃ re yu ̶ a sãriri ̃ marone je ̃ aejacoacaju ̶ yu ̶ a yuja .

text: The day following , when the people which stood on the other side of the sea saw that there was none other boat there , save that one whereinto his disciples were entered , and that Jesus went not with his disciples into the boat , but that his disciples were gone away alone ;
text2: U ̶ tabu ̶ cu ̶ ra gajejacatu ̶ aju ̶ tujacana , cu ̃ muane yu ̶ a i ̃ buerã Jesús i ̃ manone yu ̶ a je ̃ asere i ̃ acama i ̃ na . To bajiri gajeru ̃ ̶ mu ̶ yu ̶ a tudije ̃ aejabetore i ̃ acõari , Jesúre que ̃ ne i ̃ re i ̃ abeticõari , Tiberias macana i ̃ na ejase cu ̃ mune je ̃ aejayuma , Capernaum vãme cu ̶ ti macaju ̶ , Jesúre macarã .

text: And when they had found him on the other side of the sea , they said unto him , Rabbi , when camest thou hither ?
text2: Yu ̶ are i ̃ abu ̶ jacõari , ado bajiro Jesúre yise ̃ nii ̃ acama i ̃ na : — Gotimasiorimasu ̶ , ¿ Divato adore ejari mu ̶ ? — i ̃ re yise ̃ nii ̃ acama i ̃ na .

text: Jesus answered them and said , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Ye seek me , not because ye saw the miracles , but because ye did eat of the loaves , and were filled .
text2: To bajiro i ̃ na yise ̃ nii ̃ asere ajicõari : — Ñamasusere riojo mu ̶ are gotiaja yu ̶ . I ̃ ai ̃ añamanire yu ̶ yii ̃ osere i ̃ ari , “ To bajiro yigu ̶ i ̃ ñajare , i ̃ re ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ su ̶ yaroti ñaja ” yirã me yu ̶ re macasu ̶ yaja mu ̶ a . “ Que ̃ naro bau ̶ su ̶ cu ̶ tiriaroju ̶ bare ecagu ̶ ñaami ” yirã ñari , bajiaja mu ̶ a .

text: Labour not for the meat which perisheth , but for that meat which endureth unto everlasting life , which the Son of man shall give unto you : for him hath God the Father sealed .
text2: Bare mu ̶ a bojamasuseju ̶ ama yoaro meacane mu ̶ are jediveocoatoja ti . To bajiri mu ̶ a barotire tu ̶ oi ̃ arejaibeticõaña mu ̶ a . Gajeye barere bajiro bajise ñaja , Dios i ̃ roticõacacu ̶ yu ̶ re ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ rãre yu ̶ i ̃ sisema . Jedibetiru ̶ aroja tima . “ ‘ Tire i ̃ simasiami ’ yu ̶ re yimasiato i ̃ na ” yigu ̶ , i ̃ ai ̃ añamanire yu ̶ yii ̃ oru ̃ gu ̃ rotire yu ̶ re u ̶ jocami Dios . To bajiri , bare jedibetiju ̶ are bojarã , Dios i ̃ bojasere yiya mu ̶ a — i ̃ nare yicami Jesús .

text: Then said they unto him , What shall we do , that we might work the works of God ?
text2: To bajiro i ̃ yijare , i ̃ re se ̃ nii ̃ acama i ̃ na : — ¿ No bajiro yu ̶ a yirotire bojati Dios ? — i ̃ re yise ̃ nii ̃ acama .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , This is the work of God , that ye believe on him whom he hath sent .
text2: To bajiro i ̃ na yisere ajicõari ado bajiro i ̃ nare yicu ̶ dicami Jesús : — Dios i ̃ cõacacu ̶ re yu ̶ re mu ̶ a ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ sere bojaami Dios — i ̃ nare yicami Jesús yuja .

text: They said therefore unto him , What sign shewest thou then , that we may see , and believe thee ? what dost thou work ?
text2: To bajiro i ̃ yijare , — ¿ Ñie u ̃ nire Dios i ̃ masise rãca i ̃ ai ̃ añamanire yu ̶ are yii ̃ oru ̶ cu ̶ ada mu ̶ , tire i ̃ acõari “ Yu ̶ re ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ ato i ̃ na ” yu ̶ are yigu ̶ ?

text: Our fathers did eat manna in the desert ; as it is written , He gave them bread from heaven to eat .
text2: Mani ñicu ̶ a ñamasiriarã yucú ̶ manoju ̶ ñacudirã , maná vãme cu ̶ tisere bamasiñujarã i ̃ na . To bajirone gotiaja Dios ocare masa i ̃ na ucamasire . Tu ̶ oi ̃ asaque : “ Bare Dios i ̃ ñaroayere manire ecagu ̶ yive ̃ jañumi ” , yigotiaja Dios oca , masa i ̃ na ucamasire — Jesúre i ̃ re yicama . To bajiro i ̃ na yijama , “ Moisés ñamasir ' i su ̶ orine bajiriaroja ti ” yirã yicama .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Moses gave you not that bread from heaven ; but my Father giveth you the true bread from heaven .
text2: To bajiro i ̃ na yisere ajicõari , ado bajiro cu ̶ dicami Jesús : — Ñamasusere riojo mu ̶ are gotiaja yu ̶ : Moisés ñamasir ' i me Dios i ̃ ñaroayere barere i ̃ nare cõacami . Yu ̶ jacu ̶ ne ñaami i ̃ ñaroayere barere i ̃ nare cõacacu ̶ ma . To bajirone bajiaja pan que ̃ namasusere que ̃ ne . Tire mu ̶ are cõami Dios .

text: For the bread of God is he which cometh down from heaven , and giveth life unto the world .
text2: Tire mu ̶ a bajama , mu ̶ a rijato beroju ̶ , “ Tudirijabeticõato ” yigu ̶ , Dios i ̃ catisere i ̃ siecoru ̶ arãja mu ̶ a .

text: Then said they unto him , Lord , evermore give us this bread .
text2: To bajiro i ̃ yirone , — To yijama , pan que ̃ namasusere yu ̶ are ecaru ̃ gu ̃ ma mu ̶ — i ̃ re yicama i ̃ na yuja .

text: And Jesus said unto them , I am the bread of life : he that cometh to me shall never hunger ; and he that believeth on me shall never thirst .
text2: To bajiro i ̃ na yijare , ado bajiro i ̃ nare yicami Jesús yuja : — Yu ̶ ne ñaja pan que ̃ namasuse Dios i ̃ cõase . To bajiri , no bojagu ̶ yu ̶ re ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ gu ̃ ̶ ma , bau ̶ su ̶ cu ̶ tiru ̃ gu ̃ gu ̃ ̶ re bajiro bajigu ̶ mi . To bajiri , diseju ̶ ane Dios i ̃ ejare ̃ mose i ̃ re ru ̶ yabetiru ̶ aroja .

text: But I said unto you , That ye also have seen me , and believe not .
text2: To bajiro yu ̶ bajiboajaque ̃ ne , yu ̶ re ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ beaja mu ̶ a , yu ̶ re i ̃ arã ñaboarine . Je ̃ re tirene mu ̶ are gotiboabu ̶ yu ̶ .

text: All that the Father giveth me shall come to me ; and him that cometh to me I will in no wise cast out .
text2: No bojarã yu ̶ re ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ rãma , yu ̶ jacu ̶ su ̶ orine yu ̶ bojarore bajiro que ̃ naseju ̶ are tu ̶ oi ̃ avasoariarã ñaama . No bojagu ̶ yu ̶ re ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ gu ̃ ̶ re , “ Mu ̶ re bojabeaja ” , i ̃ re yibetiru ̶ cu ̶ ja yu ̶ .

text: For I came down from heaven , not to do mine own will , but the will of him that sent me .
text2: Adoju ̶ re vagu ̶ , yu ̶ bojasere yiru ̶ me rujiadicaju ̶ yu ̶ . Yu ̶ jacu ̶ i ̃ bojaseju ̶ are yiru ̶ , vadicaju ̶ yu ̶ .

text: And this is the Father ' s will which hath sent me , that of all which he hath given me I should lose nothing , but should raise it up again at the last day .
text2: Ado bajiro bojaami yu ̶ jacu ̶ , yu ̶ re cõacacu ̶ : I ̃ su ̶ orine yu ̶ re ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ rã ñajediro , ñatu ̶ sariru ̃ ̶ mu ̶ re rojose tãmu ̶ otu ̶ jabetiriaroju ̶ i ̃ na vasere bojabeami . I ̃ tu ̶ ju ̶ i ̃ na ñaseju ̶ are bojaami .

text: And this is the will of him that sent me , that every one which seeth the Son , and believeth on him , may have everlasting life : and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: No bojagu ̶ , “ Dios macu ̶ ñaja mu ̶ ” yu ̶ re yimasicõari , yu ̶ re ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ gu ̃ ̶ re , Dios i ̃ catisere i ̃ cu ̶ osere bojaami yu ̶ jacu ̶ — i ̃ nare yicami Jesús .

text: The Jews then murmured at him , because he said , I am the bread which came down from heaven .
text2: “ Pan que ̃ namasusere bajiro bajigu ̶ ñaja yu ̶ Dios i ̃ ñaroju ̶ rujiadicacu ̶ ” Jesús i ̃ yisere ajicõari , ñagõjaicama jud ' io masa u ̶ jarã .

text: And they said , Is not this Jesus , the son of Joseph , whose father and mother we know ? how is it then that he saith , I came down from heaven ?
text2: Ado bajiro gãmerã yicama : — ¿ Adi macagu ̶ , José macu ̶ me ñatique ? I ̃ jacu ̶ re , i ̃ jacore que ̃ ne masiaja mani . To bajigu ̶ ñaboarine , “ Dios i ̃ ñaroju ̶ rujiadicaju ̶ yu ̶ ” , manire yisocaboami — gãmerã yicama i ̃ na .

text: Jesus therefore answered and said unto them , Murmur not among yourselves .
text2: To bajiro i ̃ na gãmerã yiñajare , ado bajiro i ̃ nare yicami Jesús : — Yu ̶ re ñagõmacabesa mu ̶ a .

text: No man can come to me , except the Father which hath sent me draw him : and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Yu ̶ jacu ̶ su ̶ orine yu ̶ bojarore bajiro que ̃ naseju ̶ are tu ̶ oi ̃ avasoariarã ri ̃ ne ñaama yu ̶ re ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ rã . Ñatu ̶ sariru ̃ ̶ mu ̶ i ̃ nare catioru ̶ cu ̶ ja yu ̶ .

text: It is written in the prophets , And they shall be all taught of God . Every man therefore that hath heard , and hath learned of the Father , cometh unto me .
text2: Diore gotire ̃ tobosariarã yu ̶ re ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ rona i ̃ na bajirotire yirã , gotirã ado bajiro ucayuma i ̃ na : “ Dios i ̃ masise su ̶ orine masiru ̶ arãma i ̃ na jedirone ” , yiucayuma i ̃ na . To bajiri yu ̶ jacu ̶ i ̃ masise su ̶ orine yu ̶ bojarore bajiroju ̶ are tu ̶ oi ̃ avasoacõari , yu ̶ re ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ ru ̶ arãma .

text: Not that any man hath seen the Father , save he which is of God , he hath seen the Father .
text2: Masu ̶ , niju ̶ ane yu ̶ jacu ̶ re i ̃ agu ̃ ̶ maami . Yu ̶ si ̃ gu ̃ ̶ ne i ̃ tu ̶ ju ̶ re rujiadicacu ̶ ñari , i ̃ re i ̃ acacu ̶ ñaja yu ̶ .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that believeth on me hath everlasting life .
text2: Ñamasusere riojo mu ̶ are gotiaja yu ̶ : No bojagu ̶ yu ̶ re ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ gu ̃ ̶ ma , Dios i ̃ catisere cu ̶ ogu ̶ ñaami .

text: I am that bread of life .
text2: Pan que ̃ namasusere bajiro bajigu ̶ ñaja yu ̶ .

text: Your fathers did eat manna in the wilderness , and are dead .
text2: Mu ̶ a ñicu ̶ a yucú ̶ manoju ̶ maná vãme cu ̶ tisere bare , Dios i ̃ cõaru ̃ gu ̃ rere baru ̃ gu ̃ riarã ñaboarine bajireajedicoasuma i ̃ na .

text: This is the bread which cometh down from heaven , that a man may eat thereof , and not die .
text2: Yu ̶ rema , pan que ̃ namasusere bajiro bajigu ̶ re , masa i ̃ na ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ jama , bajireacoaboarine , que ̃ na tudicaticõari , que ̃ naro ñaru ̃ gu ̃ ru ̶ arãma i ̃ na .

text: I am the living bread which came down from heaven : if any man eat of this bread , he shall live for ever : and the bread that I will give is my flesh , which I will give for the life of the world .
text2: Yu ̶ ne ñaja pan que ̃ namasusere bajiro bajigu ̶ Dios i ̃ cõacacu ̶ ma . No bojarã yu ̶ re barã i ̃ na rijato beroju ̶ , que ̃ na tudicaticõari , que ̃ naro ñaru ̃ gu ̃ ru ̶ arãma . To bajiro i ̃ na bajirotire yigu ̶ , i ̃ nare rijabosaru ̶ cu ̶ ja yu ̶ — jud ' io masa u ̶ jarãre yicami Jesús .

text: The Jews therefore strove among themselves , saying , How can this man give us his flesh to eat ?
text2: To bajiro i ̃ yisere ajicõari , i ̃ na masune ado bajiro gãmerã yicama i ̃ na : — ¿ No bajiro i ̃ ruju ̶ re manire ecariqui ̃ da i ̃ ? — gãmerã yicama i ̃ na .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Except ye eat the flesh of the Son of man , and drink his blood , ye have no life in you .
text2: To bajiro i ̃ na yisere ajicõari , ado bajiro i ̃ nare yicami Jesús : — Ñamasusere riojo mu ̶ are gotiaja yu ̶ : Yu ̶ re , Dios i ̃ roticõacacu ̶ re , yu ̶ ruju ̶ re mu ̶ a babetijama , yu ̶ ri ' ire que ̃ ne mu ̶ a idibetijama , mu ̶ a rijato beroju ̶ “ Tudirijabeticõato ” yigu ̶ , Dios i ̃ catisere cu ̶ obetiru ̶ arãja mu ̶ a .

text: Whoso eateth my flesh , and drinketh my blood , hath eternal life ; and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: No bojagu ̶ yu ̶ ruju ̶ re bagu ̶ , yu ̶ ri ' ire idigu ̶ ñaami Dios i ̃ catisere cu ̶ ogu ̶ . To bajicõari , i ̃ rijato beroju ̶ ñatu ̶ sariru ̃ ̶ mu ̶ re tudicaticõari , que ̃ naro ñaru ̃ gu ̃ ru ̶ cu ̶ mi .

text: For my flesh is meat indeed , and my blood is drink indeed .
text2: Yu ̶ ruju ̶ ñaja bare ñamasuse . To bajicõari , yu ̶ ri ' i ñaja idire ñamasuse .

text: He that eateth my flesh , and drinketh my blood , dwelleth in me , and I in him .
text2: To bajiri yu ̶ ruju ̶ re bacõari , yu ̶ ri ' ire idigu ̶ ma , yu ̶ rãcagu ̶ ñagu ̃ ̶ mi . Yu ̶ ju ̶ a que ̃ ne , i ̃ rãcagu ̶ ñaja yu ̶ .

text: As the living Father hath sent me , and I live by the Father : so he that eateth me , even he shall live by me .
text2: Yu ̶ jacu ̶ , yu ̶ re cõacacu ̶ catirere cu ̶ ogu ̶ ñaami . To bajiri i ̃ su ̶ orine catiaja yu ̶ . To bajirone bajiru ̶ cu ̶ mi yu ̶ re ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ gu ̃ ̶ que ̃ ne . Yu ̶ su ̶ orine i ̃ rijato beroju ̶ que ̃ na tudicaticõari , yu ̶ rãca que ̃ naro ñacõa ñaru ̃ gu ̃ ru ̶ cu ̶ mi .

text: This is that bread which came down from heaven : not as your fathers did eat manna , and are dead : he that eateth of this bread shall live for ever .
text2: To bajiri pan que ̃ namasusere bajiro bajigu ̶ , Dios i ̃ ñaroju ̶ rujiadicacu ̶ ñaja yu ̶ . Yu ̶ ma mu ̶ a ñicu ̶ are õ vecaye bare Dios i ̃ cõare maná vãme cu ̶ tisere bajiro bajigu ̶ me ñaja . Mu ̶ a ñicu ̶ a , maná vãme cu ̶ tisere bariarã ñaboarine , bajireajediyuma i ̃ na . No bojagu ̶ yu ̶ re ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ gu ̃ ̶ ma , i ̃ rijato beroju ̶ que ̃ na tudicaticõari , yu ̶ rãca que ̃ naro ñacõa ñaru ̃ gu ̃ ru ̶ cu ̶ mi — i ̃ nare yicami Jesús , jud ' io masa u ̶ jarãre .

text: These things said he in the synagogue , as he taught in Capernaum .
text2: Ado bajiro i ̃ gotimasio ñajama , Capernaum vãme cu ̶ ti maca ñarivi , Dios ocare i ̃ na bueriviju ̶ ñacõari , i ̃ nare gotimasiocami Jesús .

text: Many therefore of his disciples , when they had heard this , said , This is an hard saying ; who can hear it ?
text2: To bajiro i ̃ gotisere ajicõari , jãjarã i ̃ re su ̶ yarã , ado bajiro gãmerã yicama i ̃ na : — To bajiro i ̃ yigotimasiose , no bajiro yimasiriaro maja . Tire ajivarique ̃ nagu ̃ ̶ magu ̃ ̶ mi — gãmerã yicama i ̃ na .

text: When Jesus knew in himself that his disciples murmured at it , he said unto them , Doth this offend you ?
text2: To bajiro i ̃ na gãmerã yisere masicõacami Jesús . To bajiri , ado bajiro i ̃ nare yicami : — To bajiro mu ̶ are yu ̶ yigotimasiosere ajitebesa mu ̶ a .

text: What and if ye shall see the Son of man ascend up where he was before ?
text2: “ Riojo me yami ” mu ̶ a yitu ̶ oi ̃ ajama , Dios i ̃ roticõacacu ̶ õ vecaju ̶ yu ̶ vadicatoju ̶ re que ̃ na yu ̶ tudimu ̶ jatore i ̃ acõari , “ Riojo yiyumi ” , yitu ̶ oi ̃ aboaru ̶ arãja mu ̶ a .

text: It is the spirit that quickeneth ; the flesh profiteth nothing : the words that I speak unto you , they are spirit , and they are life .
text2: “ Yu ̶ ruju ̶ re i ̃ na base su ̶ orine , i ̃ na rijato beroju ̶ ‘ Tudirijabeticõato ’ yigu ̶ , Dios i ̃ catisere cu ̶ oru ̶ arãma masa ” yu ̶ yijama , yu ̶ ruju ̶ re yigu ̶ me yaja yu ̶ . Yu ̶ re masa i ̃ na ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ seju ̶ are yigu ̶ yaja . Yu ̶ re ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ rãrema Esp ' iritu Santore i ̃ nare cõaru ̶ cu ̶ ja yu ̶ , i ̃ na rijato beroju ̶ , “ Tudirijabeticõato ” yigu ̶ .

text: But there are some of you that believe not . For Jesus knew from the beginning who they were that believed not , and who should betray him .
text2: To bajiro yu ̶ yigotisere , “ Socu ̶ yami ” , yitu ̶ oi ̃ aja mu ̶ a si ̃ gu ̃ ̶ ri — i ̃ nare yicami Jesús . Re ̃ moju ̶ ne , “ I ̃ na ñaru ̶ arãma ‘ Socu ̶ yami ’ ” yu ̶ re yitu ̶ oi ̃ arã , to yicõari , “ I ̃ ñaru ̶ cu ̶ mi yu ̶ re i ̃ sirocarocu ̶ ” yimasigu ̃ ̶ ñari , to bajiro i ̃ nare yicami .

text: And he said , Therefore said I unto you , that no man can come unto me , except it were given unto him of my Father .
text2: To bajiro yigajanocõari , ado bajiro i ̃ nare gotique ̃ nocami : — “ Yu ̶ re su ̶ yarã si ̃ gu ̃ ̶ ri , ‘ Socu ̶ yami ’ , yu ̶ re yitu ̶ oi ̃ aama ” yimasigu ̃ ̶ ñari , “ Ñimarã yu ̶ re ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ rã maniborãma , yu ̶ jacu ̶ su ̶ orine que ̃ naseju ̶ are i ̃ na tu ̶ oi ̃ avasoabetijama ” , mu ̶ are yibu ̶ yu ̶ . To bajiri yu ̶ jacu ̶ su ̶ orine que ̃ naseju ̶ are tu ̶ oi ̃ avasoarã me ñari , “ Socu ̶ yami ” , yu ̶ re yaja mu ̶ a si ̃ gu ̃ ̶ ri — i ̃ nare yicami Jesús .

text: From that time many of his disciples went back , and walked no more with him .
text2: To bajiro i ̃ yisere ajicõari , jãjarã i ̃ re su ̶ yaboacana i ̃ re cãmotadicõari , ju ̶ aji i ̃ rãca vacudibeticama i ̃ na yuja .

text: Then said Jesus unto the twelve , Will ye also go away ?
text2: To bajiro i ̃ na bajiro i ̃ acõari , ju ̶ aãmo cõro , gu ̶ bo ju ̶ a je ̃ nituarirãcu ̶ ñarãre ado bajiro yu ̶ are se ̃ nii ̃ acami Jesús : — ¿ Mu ̶ a que ̃ ne , “ I ̃ re cãmotadito mani ” , yu ̶ re yitu ̶ oi ̃ ati mu ̶ a ? — yu ̶ are yise ̃ nii ̃ acami .

text: Then Simon Peter answered him , Lord , to whom shall we go ? thou hast the words of eternal life .
text2: To bajiro i ̃ yisere ajicõari , ado bajiro i ̃ re yicu ̶ dicami Pedro : — Ñimu ̶ ju ̶ a mu ̶ re bajiro bajigu ̶ magu ̃ ̶ mi . Yu ̶ a rijato beroju ̶ , “ Tudirijabeticõato ” yigu ̶ , Dios i ̃ catisere yu ̶ are mu ̶ i ̃ sisere gotiaja mu ̶ .

text: And we believe and are sure that thou art that Christ , the Son of the living God .
text2: Mu ̶ re ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ aja yu ̶ a . “ Rojose yigu ̶ me , Dios i ̃ cõar ' i ñaja mu ̶ ” , mu ̶ re yimasiaja yu ̶ a — Jesúre i ̃ re yicami Pedro .

text: Jesus answered them , Have not I chosen you twelve , and one of you is a devil ?
text2: To bajiro i ̃ yisere ajicõari ado bajiro yu ̶ are yicami Jesús : — Mu ̶ arema , ¿ ju ̶ aãmo cõro , gu ̶ bo ju ̶ a je ̃ nituarirãcu ̶ ñarãre yu ̶ ne mu ̶ are bese juabeticati yu ̶ ? To yu ̶ yicana mu ̶ a ñaboajaque ̃ ne , mu ̶ a vatoare ñaami si ̃ gu ̃ ̶ vãtia u ̶ ju ̶ re cu ̶ digu ̶ — yu ̶ are yicami Jesús .

text: He spake of Judas Iscariot the son of Simon : for he it was that should betray him , being one of the twelve .
text2: To bajise i ̃ yijama , Simón macu ̶ Judas Iscariotere yigu ̶ yiyumi Jesús , yu ̶ a ju ̶ aãmo cõro , gu ̶ bo ju ̶ a je ̃ nituaro rãcagu ̶ ñaboarine , i ̃ re i ̃ sirocarocu ̶ i ̃ ñajare .

text: After these things Jesus walked in Galilee : for he would not walk in Jewry , because the Jews sought to kill him .
text2: To bajiro i ̃ yiro bero , que ̃ na Galilea sitaju ̶ yu ̶ are u ̃ mato vacudicami Jesús . Judea sitaju ̶ ñaru ̶ abeticami , ti sitana jud ' io masa u ̶ jarã i ̃ re i ̃ na si ̃ aru ̶ ajare .

text: Now the Jews ' feast of tabernacles was at hand .
text2: Yucú ̶ manoju ̶ i ̃ na ñicu ̶ a i ̃ na ñacudimasirere tu ̶ oi ̃ ariaru ̃ ̶ mu ̶ ri , Enramadas vãme cu ̶ ti boseru ̃ ̶ mu ̶ cõñacaju ̶ .

text: His brethren therefore said unto him , Depart hence , and go into Judaea , that thy disciples also may see the works that thou doest .
text2: To bajiri , Jesús bederã ado bajiro i ̃ re yicama : — Judea sitaju ̶ mu ̶ re su ̶ yaboacana , jãjarã ñarãma . To bajiri adoju ̶ re tujabesa . Toju ̶ ane tudicoasa mu ̶ , i ̃ na que ̃ ne , “ I ̃ ai ̃ añamanire mu ̶ yii ̃ oru ̃ gu ̃ sere i ̃ ato i ̃ na ” yigu ̶ .

text: For there is no man that doeth any thing in secret , and he himself seeketh to be known openly . If thou do these things , shew thyself to the world .
text2: No bojagu ̶ , jãjarã masa i ̃ re i ̃ na i ̃ amasirotire i ̃ bojajama , masa mojoroaca ñaroju ̶ re yii ̃ ocudibecu ̶ mi . I ̃ ai ̃ añamanire yii ̃ omasigu ̃ ̶ ñari , jãjarã i ̃ na ñaroju ̶ are yii ̃ oaya mu ̶ — i ̃ re yicama i ̃ na , Jesús bederã .

text: For neither did his brethren believe in him .
text2: Jesús bederã ñaboarine , “ ‘ Rotimu ̶ oru ̃ ̶ gõru ̶ cu ̶ mi ’ yigu ̶ , Dios i ̃ cõar ' i ñaami ” , i ̃ re yitu ̶ oi ̃ arã me ñacama .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , My time is not yet come : but your time is alway ready .
text2: To bajiri ado bajiro i ̃ nare yicami Jesús : — Judeaju ̶ yu ̶ varoti ejabeaja maji . No bojariru ̃ ̶ mu ̶ mu ̶ a vajama , mu ̶ arema que ̃ nacõaja .

text: The world cannot hate you ; but me it hateth , because I testify of it , that the works thereof are evil .
text2: Diore ajimena mu ̶ a ñajare , mu ̶ are i ̃ atemenama . Yu ̶ rema i ̃ ateama i ̃ na , “ Mu ̶ a yiru ̃ gu ̃ se , rojose ñaja ti ” i ̃ nare yu ̶ yijare .

text: Go ye up unto this feast : I go not up yet unto this feast ; for my time is not yet full come .
text2: Enramadas boseru ̃ ̶ mu ̶ i ̃ arã vasa mu ̶ ama . Yu ̶ rema , yu ̶ varoti ejabeaja maji — i ̃ bederãre yicami Jesús .

text: When he had said these words unto them , he abode still in Galilee .
text2: To bajiro i ̃ nare i ̃ yiro bero , Galilea sitaju ̶ re ñacõacaju ̶ yu ̶ a maji .

text: But when his brethren were gone up , then went he also up unto the feast , not openly , but as it were in secret .
text2: I ̃ bederã i ̃ na vato bero , Jesús que ̃ ne , Enramadas boseru ̃ ̶ mu ̶ u ̃ mato i ̃ agu ̃ ̶ vacami . To bajiboarine , yayioroaca yu ̶ are u ̃ mato ejacami .

text: Then the Jews sought him at the feast , and said , Where is he ?
text2: To ñacama jud ' io masa u ̶ jarã que ̃ ne . I ̃ re macaboacama . — ¿ Noju ̶ ñati i ̃ ? — yicudiboacama .

text: And there was much murmuring among the people concerning him : for some said , He is a good man : others said , Nay ; but he deceiveth the people .
text2: Tiru ̃ ̶ mu ̶ rire jãjarã masa Jesúre ñagõjai ñacama i ̃ na . Si ̃ gu ̃ ̶ ri ado bajiro yicama : — Que ̃ naro yigu ̶ ñagu ̃ ̶ mi — yicama i ̃ na . Gãjerãju ̶ ama : — Que ̃ naro yigu ̶ me ñagu ̃ ̶ mi . Masare yitogu ̶ ñagu ̃ ̶ mi — boca yicama . U ̶ jarãre güirã ñari , i ̃ na masune yayioroaca gãmerã ñagõcõa ñacama i ̃ na , Jesúre gõjarã .

text: Now about the midst of the feast Jesus went up into the temple , and taught .
text2: Enramadas boseru ̃ ̶ mu ̶ i ̃ na yi gu ̶ dareco cu ̶ tiato , Diore yiru ̃ ̶ cu ̶ bu ̶ oriavire sãjacõari , masare i ̃ nare gotimasiocami Jesús yuja .

text: And the Jews marvelled , saying , How knoweth this man letters , having never learned ?
text2: I ̃ gotimasiosere ajicõari , no yimasibeticama jud ' io masa u ̶ jarã : — Buebetir ' i ñaboarine , ¿ no yigu ̶ to bajise gotimasiomasiati i ̃ ? — yicama i ̃ na .

text: Jesus answered them , and said , My doctrine is not mine , but his that sent me .
text2: To bajiro i ̃ na yisere masicõari , — Yu ̶ gotimasiosema yu ̶ ye me ñaja . Yu ̶ re cõacacu ̶ ye ñaja ti .

text: If any man will do his will , he shall know of the doctrine , whether it be of God , or whether I speak of myself .
text2: Dios i ̃ bojasere mu ̶ a yiru ̶ ajama , “ Dios i ̃ yerene gotimasioami ” , yimasiborãja mu ̶ a .

text: He that speaketh of himself seeketh his own glory : but he that seeketh his glory that sent him , the same is true , and no unrighteousness is in him .
text2: No bojagu ̶ no i ̃ tu ̶ oi ̃ asene gotigu ̶ ma , masa que ̃ nase i ̃ re i ̃ na yiru ̃ ̶ cu ̶ bu ̶ osere bojagu ̶ mi . No bojagu ̶ i ̃ re cõacacu ̶ re Diore masa que ̃ nase i ̃ re i ̃ na yiru ̃ ̶ cu ̶ bu ̶ osere bojagu ̶ ma , riojo masune gotigu ̶ ñagu ̃ ̶ mi . Ñie u ̃ niju ̶ are masare i ̃ nare yitobecu ̶ mi .

text: Did not Moses give you the law , and yet none of you keepeth the law ? Why go ye about to kill me ?
text2: ¿ Moisés ñamasir ' i Dios i ̃ rotimasirere mu ̶ are cu ̃ besujarique i ̃ ? Tire cu ̶ orã ñaboarine no bojagu ̶ mu ̶ a vatoare Dios i ̃ rotimasirere cu ̶ dijeogu ̶ maami . Rojose yu ̶ yibetiboajaque ̃ ne yu ̶ re si ̃ aru ̶ aja mu ̶ a — masare yicami Jesús .

text: The people answered and said , Thou hast a devil : who goeth about to kill thee ?
text2: To bajiro i ̃ yisere ajicõari , ado bajiro i ̃ re cu ̶ dicama i ̃ na masa : — Vãti mu ̶ u ̶ su ̶ ju ̶ re sãjacõari , rojose mu ̶ re yitogu ̶ yigu ̶ mi . Ñimu ̶ ju ̶ a mu ̶ re si ̃ aru ̶ agu ̶ magu ̃ ̶ mi — i ̃ re yicama i ̃ na , Jesúre .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , I have done one work , and ye all marvel .
text2: To bajiro i ̃ na yijare , — U ̶ su ̶ sãjariaru ̃ ̶ mu ̶ ñaboajaque ̃ ne , si ̃ gu ̃ ̶ rijagu ̶ re yu ̶ catioro i ̃ acõari i ̃ au ̶ cacaju ̶ mu ̶ a , “ U ̶ su ̶ sãjariaru ̃ ̶ mu ̶ ñaboajaque ̃ ne moami ” yii ̃ aterã .

text: Moses therefore gave unto you circumcision ; ( not because it is of Moses , but of the fathers ; ) and ye on the sabbath day circumcise a man .
text2: Moisés ñamasir ' i su ̃ cacare circuncisión yirere mu ̶ are rotiyumi i ̃ . I ̃ masu me tire rotisu ̶ oyumi . Je ̃ re i ̃ ñicu ̶ aju ̶ ne to bajirone yicoadimasiñujarã i ̃ na . To bajiro rotimasire ñajare , u ̶ su ̶ sãjariaru ̃ ̶ mu ̶ ti ñaboajaque ̃ ne , su ̃ care circuncisión yaja mu ̶ a .

text: If a man on the sabbath day receive circumcision , that the law of Moses should not be broken ; are ye angry at me , because I have made a man every whit whole on the sabbath day ?
text2: Moisés ñamasir ' i i ̃ rotimasirere cu ̶ dirã ñari , u ̶ su ̶ sãjariaru ̃ ̶ mu ̶ ti ñaboajaque ̃ ne su ̃ care circuncisión yaja mu ̶ a . Yu ̶ ju ̶ arema u ̶ su ̶ sãjariaru ̃ ̶ mu ̶ ti ñaboajaque ̃ ne si ̃ gu ̃ ̶ rijagu ̶ re yu ̶ catiojama , ¿ no yirã yu ̶ re ju ̃ nisiniati mu ̶ a ?

text: Judge not according to the appearance , but judge righteous judgment .
text2: Ñie manone rujajine que ̃ naro tu ̶ oi ̃ abetiboarine , “ Rojose i ̃ re ñaja ” , yu ̶ re yibesa mu ̶ a . “ Rojose i ̃ re ñaja ” mu ̶ a yijama , que ̃ naro tu ̶ oi ̃ a ri ̃ joro yicõari , “ Rojose i ̃ re ñaja ” , yu ̶ re yiya mu ̶ a — i ̃ nare yicami Jesús , masare .

text: Then said some of them of Jerusalem , Is not this he , whom they seek to kill ?
text2: To bajiro i ̃ yisere ajicõari , Jerusalén macana si ̃ gu ̃ ̶ ri i ̃ na masune gãmerã se ̃ nii ̃ acama i ̃ na : — ¿ Si ̃ aru ̶ arã , i ̃ na macagu ̶ me ñaruyuati i ̃ ?

text: But , lo , he speaketh boldly , and they say nothing unto him . Do the rulers know indeed that this is the very Christ ?
text2: Ado mani jediro ri ̃ joroju ̶ are ñagõñaami i ̃ . To i ̃ bajiboajaque ̃ ne si ̃ gu ̃ ̶ i ̃ re boca yimatagu ̶ maami . Adoana u ̶ jarã , “ Cristo Dios i ̃ cõagu ̃ ̶ , mani u ̶ ju ̶ ñagu ̃ ̶ mi i ̃ ” , ¿ yitu ̶ oi ̃ arãda i ̃ na ?

text: Howbeit we know this man whence he is : but when Christ cometh , no man knoweth whence he is .
text2: “ Ti macagu ̶ vayumi ” , yimasiaja mani . Cristorema , “ I ̃ ejaro , ‘ Toagu ̶ vayumi ’ yimasibetiru ̶ arãja mani ” , yiadire ñaja — i ̃ na masune gãmerã yicama i ̃ na , Jerusalén macana si ̃ gu ̃ ̶ ri .

text: Then cried Jesus in the temple as he taught , saying , Ye both know me , and ye know whence I am : and I am not come of myself , but he that sent me is true , whom ye know not .
text2: To bajiro i ̃ na yisere ajicõari , Diore yiru ̃ ̶ cu ̶ bu ̶ oriaviju ̶ gotimasio ñacacu ̶ , oca tutuase rãca ñagõcami Jesús yuja : — Yu ̶ re i ̃ acõari , “ Ti macagu ̶ ñaami ” , yu ̶ re yitu ̶ oi ̃ aboaja mu ̶ a . To bajiro mu ̶ a yitu ̶ oi ̃ ajama , yu ̶ re cõacacu ̶ re riojo yigu ̶ re masibeaja mu ̶ a .

text: But I know him : for I am from him , and he hath sent me .
text2: Yu ̶ ma i ̃ re masiaja . I ̃ cõacacu ̶ ne ñaja yu ̶ . I ̃ ñaroju ̶ ne vadicaju ̶ yu ̶ — i ̃ nare yicami Jesús .

text: Then they sought to take him : but no man laid hands on him , because his hour was not yet come .
text2: To bajiro i ̃ yijare , bu ̶ to i ̃ re ajiju ̃ nisinirã ñari , i ̃ re ñiaru ̶ aboacama i ̃ na , jud ' io masa u ̶ jarã . To bajiboarine i ̃ re ñiamasibeticama i ̃ na , “ To cõrone ñiaecoru ̶ cu ̶ mi ” Dios i ̃ yiriaru ̃ ̶ mu ̶ ti ejabetijare .

text: And many of the people believed on him , and said , When Christ cometh , will he do more miracles than these which this man hath done ?
text2: Gãjerãma jãjarã i ̃ re ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ cama i ̃ na . To bajiri ado bajiro yicama i ̃ na : — Cristo , Dios i ̃ cõar ' i ñagu ̃ ̶ mi ãni . No bojagu ̶ i ̃ re ̃ toro i ̃ ai ̃ añamanire yigu ̶ maniru ̶ cu ̶ mi — yicama i ̃ na , i ̃ re ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ rã .

text: The Pharisees heard that the people murmured such things concerning him ; and the Pharisees and the chief priests sent officers to take him .
text2: Masa Jesús i ̃ bajisere yayioroaca i ̃ na gotiro ajiyuma fariseo masa . To bajiri , Diore yiru ̃ ̶ cu ̶ bu ̶ oriavi coderimasare Jesúre i ̃ re ñiarotiyuma i ̃ na , paia u ̶ jarã que ̃ ne .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , Yet a little while am I with you , and then I go unto him that sent me .
text2: I ̃ na ejaro i ̃ acõari ado bajiro yicami Jesús : — Yu ̶ re cõacacu ̶ tu ̶ ju ̶ que ̃ na tudiaru ̶ cu ̶ ja yu ̶ . To bajiri yoaro meaca adore masa tu ̶ ju ̶ re ñaru ̶ cu ̶ ja yu ̶ .

text: Ye shall seek me , and shall not find me : and where I am , thither ye cannot come .
text2: Yu ̶ re macaru ̶ arãja mu ̶ a . To bajiboarine yu ̶ re bu ̶ jabetiru ̶ arãja mu ̶ a . Yu ̶ ñaroju ̶ re no bajiro yi vamasibetiru ̶ arãja mu ̶ a — masare i ̃ nare yigoticami Jesús .

text: Then said the Jews among themselves , Whither will he go , that we shall not find him ? will he go unto the dispersed among the Gentiles , and teach the Gentiles ?
text2: To bajiro Jesús i ̃ yisere ajicõari , jud ' io masa u ̶ jarã i ̃ na masune gãmerã se ̃ nii ̃ acama i ̃ na : — ¿ Noju ̶ re variqui ̃ da i ̃ , i ̃ re mani bu ̶ jabetirotoju ̶ rema ? Mani ñaro soju ̶ aju ̶ vacõari griego masa rãca vu ̶ sarã tu ̶ ju ̶ varu ̶ yigu ̶ mi , i ̃ yijama . Toju ̶ re vacõari , gãjerã masare , o mani yarãre gotimasiogu ̃ ̶ varu ̶ yigu ̶ mi , i ̃ yijama .

text: What manner of saying is this that he said , Ye shall seek me , and shall not find me : and where I am , thither ye cannot come ?
text2: “ Yu ̶ re macaboarine yu ̶ re bu ̶ jabetiru ̶ arãja mu ̶ a . To bajicõari yu ̶ ñaroju ̶ re vamasibetiru ̶ arãja mu ̶ a ” i ̃ yijama , ¿ no yire u ̃ nire yati i ̃ ? — gãmerã yiñagõcama i ̃ na .

text: In the last day , that great day of the feast , Jesus stood and cried , saying , If any man thirst , let him come unto me , and drink .
text2: Masa manoju ̶ i ̃ na ñicu ̶ a i ̃ na ñacudimasirere tu ̶ oi ̃ atu ̶ sariaru ̃ ̶ mu ̶ , tiru ̃ ̶ mu ̶ ñacaju ̶ rujaru ̃ ̶ mu ̶ masuma . Tiru ̃ ̶ mu ̶ re vu ̃ ̶ mu ̶ ru ̃ ̶ gu ̃ ̶ cõari , oca tutuase rãca ñagõcami Jesús : — Si ̃ gu ̃ ̶ i ̃ oco idiru ̶ ajama , oco se ̃ nigu ̃ ̶ mi . Tire bajirone , no bojagu ̶ Diore i ̃ masiru ̶ ajama , yu ̶ tu ̶ ju ̶ re vadicõari i ̃ re yu ̶ catiorotire se ̃ nigu ̃ ̶ ejato i ̃ .

text: He that believeth on me , as the scripture hath said , out of his belly shall flow rivers of living water .
text2: Ajiya mu ̶ a . Ado bajiro gotiaja Dios ocare masa i ̃ na ucamasire : No bojarã yu ̶ re ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ rãrema , “ I ̃ na u ̶ su ̶ riju ̶ oco masare catiose , riagare bajiro u ̃ mayucõa ñaru ̶ aroja , ‘ Diorãca que ̃ naro ñacõa ñaru ̃ gu ̃ rãjaro ’ yiro ” , yigotiaja Dios oca — masare i ̃ nare yigoticami Jesús .

text: ( But this spake he of the Spirit , which they that believe on him should receive : for the Holy Ghost was not yet given ; because that Jesus was not yet glorified . )
text2: To bajiro i ̃ yijama , “ Yu ̶ re ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ rãre i ̃ na u ̶ su ̶ riju ̶ re , Dios i ̃ cõagu ̃ ̶ Esp ' iritu Santo ejacõari que ̃ naro i ̃ nare ejare ̃ mocõa ñaru ̃ gu ̃ ru ̶ cu ̶ mi , i ̃ na rijato beroju ̶ tudirijabeticõari , Diorãca que ̃ naro ñaronare ” yigu ̶ yicami Jesús . Õ vecaju ̶ re , que ̃ nase i ̃ re yiru ̃ ̶ cu ̶ bu ̶ oriaju ̶ ju ̶ re Jesús i ̃ tudiejabetijare , Dios i ̃ cõagu ̃ ̶ Esp ' iritu Santore adi macaru ̶ cu ̶ rore Jesúre ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ canare cõabesumi Dios maji .

text: Many of the people therefore , when they heard this saying , said , Of a truth this is the Prophet .
text2: Jesús i ̃ ñagõsere ajicõari , si ̃ gu ̃ ̶ ri ado bajiro yicama : — Diore i ̃ re gotire ̃ tobosarimasa , Dios ocare ucarã , “ To bajiru ̶ cu ̶ mi ” masa i ̃ na yiucamasir ' i masune ñaami — yicama i ̃ na , si ̃ gu ̃ ̶ ri .

text: Others said , This is the Christ . But some said , Shall Christ come out of Galilee ?
text2: Gãjerãju ̶ ama ado bajiro yicama i ̃ na : — Cristo , “ Rotimu ̶ oru ̃ ̶ gõru ̶ cu ̶ mi ” yigu ̶ , Dios i ̃ cõar ' i masune ñacõaami — yicama i ̃ na . Gãjerãma ado bajiro yicama : — Cristo me ñaami . No bajiro yigu ̶ , Galileagu ̶ ne Cristo ñabecu ̶ mi .

text: Hath not the scripture said , That Christ cometh of the seed of David , and out of the town of Bethlehem , where David was ?
text2: Dios ocare masa i ̃ na ucamasire ti gotijama , ado bajiro yaja : “ U ̶ ju ̶ David ñamasir ' i jãnerabatia jãnami ñaru ̶ cu ̶ mi Cristo . To bajiri David ñamasir ' ire bajirone Belén macagu ̶ ne ñaru ̶ cu ̶ mi i ̃ que ̃ ne ” , yigotiaja Dios oca — yicama i ̃ na .

text: So there was a division among the people because of him .
text2: Ado bajise ricatiri ri ̃ ne Jesúre i ̃ re yitu ̶ oi ̃ acama i ̃ na .

text: And some of them would have taken him ; but no man laid hands on him .
text2: Si ̃ gu ̃ ̶ ri i ̃ re ñiaru ̶ aboacama . To bajiboarine i ̃ re ñiamasibeticama .

text: Then came the officers to the chief priests and Pharisees ; and they said unto them , Why have ye not brought him ?
text2: Diore yiru ̃ ̶ cu ̶ bu ̶ oriavire coderimasa Jesúre i ̃ re ñiamasibeticõari , fariseo masa , paia u ̶ jarã tu ̶ ju ̶ re tudiacama i ̃ na . Ñie manane i ̃ na ejaro i ̃ acõari ado bajiro i ̃ nare yise ̃ nii ̃ añujarã i ̃ na paia u ̶ jarã : — ¿ No yirã i ̃ re ãmiadibeti mu ̶ a ? — i ̃ nare yiyujarã i ̃ na .

text: The officers answered , Never man spake like this man .
text2: Ado bajiro i ̃ nare yicu ̶ diyujarã Diore yiru ̃ ̶ cu ̶ bu ̶ oriavire coderimasa : — I ̃ re bajiro ñagõrã manicama i ̃ na — yiyujarã i ̃ na .

text: Then answered them the Pharisees , Are ye also deceived ?
text2: To bajiro i ̃ na yijare , fariseo masaju ̶ a ado bajiro i ̃ nare yiyujarã : — ¿ To yitogu ̶ i ̃ yiserene i ̃ re ajiri mu ̶ a ?

text: Have any of the rulers or of the Pharisees believed on him ?
text2: Mu ̶ a u ̶ jarã ñaja yu ̶ a . Yu ̶ ama si ̃ gu ̃ ̶ i ̃ re ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ gu ̃ ̶ maja . Mani u ̶ jarã que ̃ ne si ̃ gu ̃ ̶ i ̃ re ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ gu ̃ ̶ maami .

text: But this people who knoweth not the law are cursed .
text2: Adoana masa Moisés ñamasir ' i i ̃ rotimasirere masibeticõari , Jesúre i ̃ re ajitiru ̃ ̶ nu ̶ rãma . To bajiro i ̃ na bajijare , i ̃ nare rearu ̶ cu ̶ mi Dios — yiyujarã i ̃ na fariseo masa .

text: Nicodemus saith unto them , ( he that came to Jesus by night , being one of them , )
text2: Nicodemo ñamiju ̶ Jesúre i ̃ re i ̃ agu ̃ ̶ ejar ' i , fariseo masu ̶ ñañuju i ̃ que ̃ ne . I ̃ babarãre ado bajiro i ̃ nare yiyuju i ̃ :

text: Doth our law judge any man , before it hear him , and know what he doeth ?
text2: — ¡ Majique ! Moisés ñamasir ' i manire i ̃ rotimasirere yirã , i ̃ gotisere ajicõari , i ̃ re se ̃ nii ̃ abetiboarine , “ Rojose ñaja ti , i ̃ re ” , yimasibeaja mani — yiyuju Nicodemo , i ̃ babarãre .

text: They answered and said unto him , Art thou also of Galilee ? Search , and look : for out of Galilee ariseth no prophet .
text2: To bajiro i ̃ yijare , — ¿ Mu ̶ que ̃ ne Galileagu ̶ ñatique mu ̶ ? Dios ocare masa i ̃ na ucamasiriatutire i ̃ ai ̃ asaque mu ̶ . Tire mu ̶ buero bero , “ Diore gotire ̃ tobosarimasu ̶ Galileaju ̶ vadir ' i maniru ̶ cu ̶ mi ” yiucaturere masiru ̶ cu ̶ ja mu ̶ que ̃ ne — i ̃ re yiyujarã i ̃ na , Nicodemore tud ' irã .

text: And every man went unto his own house .
text2: To bajiro i ̃ re yicõa , i ̃ na ya viriju ̶ tudijedicoasujarã i ̃ na .

text: Jesus went unto the mount of Olives .
text2: Macaju ̶ yu ̶ a tujarone , Olivo vãme cu ̶ ti buroju ̶ majacoacami Jesús .

text: And early in the morning he came again into the temple , and all the people came unto him ; and he sat down , and taught them .
text2: Gajeru ̃ ̶ mu ̶ , busuriju ̶ , Diore yiru ̃ ̶ cu ̶ bu ̶ oriaviju ̶ tudiejacami que ̃ na Jesús . I ̃ ejaro i ̃ acõari jãjarã masa i ̃ tu ̶ re re ̃ jacama . To bajiro i ̃ na bajijare , rujicõari yu ̶ are gotimasiocami Jesús .

text: And the scribes and Pharisees brought unto him a woman taken in adultery ; and when they had set her in the midst ,
text2: To bajiro yu ̶ are i ̃ yigotimasio ñarone , fariseo masa , Dios i ̃ rotimasire gotimasiorimasa que ̃ ne ejacama . Si ̃ gõ rõmio manaju ̶ cu ̶ tiboarine gãji rãca ajeri cu ̶ tigore yu ̶ a i ̃ aro ri ̃ joroju ̶ are sore jiaejocama i ̃ na .

text: They say unto him , Master , this woman was taken in adultery , in the very act .
text2: To yicõari , ado bajiro Jesúre i ̃ re yicama i ̃ na : — Yu ̶ are masiogu ̃ ̶ , adio rõmio manaju ̶ cu ̶ tiboarine gãji rãca so ajeri cu ̶ tisere i ̃ amu ̶ yu ̶ a .

text: Now Moses in the law commanded us , that such should be stoned : but what sayest thou ?
text2: Moisés ñamasir ' i i ̃ rotimasire ado bajiro yirotiaja ti : “ To bajiro yirãrema gu ̃ ̶ tane i ̃ nare reasi ̃ aña ” , yaja ti . Mu ̶ ma , ¿ no bajiro tu ̶ oi ̃ ati mu ̶ ? — Jesúre i ̃ re yicama .

text: This they said , tempting him , that they might have to accuse him . But Jesus stooped down , and with his finger wrote on the ground , as though he heard them not .
